trans-unit.source: The element offers no user-controllable method for resizing it.
trans-unit.target: 该元素没有提供用户可控的方法来调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: The element skips its contents. The skipped contents must not be accessible to user-agent features, such as find-in-page, tab-order navigation, etc., nor be selectable or focusable. This is similar to giving the contents display: none.
trans-unit.target: 元素跳过其内容。用户代理功能（例如，在页面中查找，按选项卡排序的导航等）不能访问已跳过的内容，也不能选择或聚焦。这类似于 display: none 内容：none。

trans-unit.source: The element spans across all columns. Content in the normal flow that appears before the element is automatically balanced across all columns before the element appears. The element establishes a new block formatting context.
trans-unit.target: 该元素横跨所有列。在元素出现之前,正常流程中的内容会在元素出现之前自动平衡到所有列。该元素建立了一个新的块格式化上下文。

trans-unit.source: The element turns on layout containment, style containment, and paint containment. If the element is not relevant to the user, it also skips its contents. Unlike hidden, the skipped contents must still be available as normal to user-agent features such as find-in-page, tab order navigation, etc., and must be focusable and selectable as normal.
trans-unit.target: 该元素开启布局遏制、样式遏制和油漆遏制。如果该元素与用户无关,也会跳过其内容。与隐藏不同的是,被跳过的内容必须仍然可以像正常的用户代理功能一样使用,如页面中的查找、标签顺序导航等,并且必须可以像正常的焦点和选择。

trans-unit.source: The element won't be selected as a potential anchor.
trans-unit.target: 该元素不会被选为潜在的锚。

trans-unit.source: The element's content has been specifically and carefully crafted to use colors, images, and styles in a thoughtful and/or important way, such that being altered by the browser might actually make things worse rather than better. The appearance of the content should not be changed except by the user's request. For example, a page might include a list of information with rows whose background colors alternate between white and a light grey. Removing the background color would decrease the legibility of the content.
trans-unit.target: 该元素的内容是经过特别精心设计的,以一种深思熟虑和/或重要的方式使用颜色、图像和样式,因此,被浏览器改变实际上可能会使事情变得更糟而不是更好。除非用户提出要求,否则不应改变内容的外观。例如,一个页面可能包括一个信息列表,其背景颜色在白色和浅灰色之间交替。去掉背景色会降低内容的可读性。

trans-unit.source: The element's height is set to the value of min-height whenever min-height is larger than max-height or height.
trans-unit.target: 每当 min-height 大于 max-height 或 height 时，元素的高度都将设置为 min-height 的值。

trans-unit.source: The element's width is set to the value of min-width whenever min-width is larger than max-width or width.
trans-unit.target: 每当 min-width 大于 max-width 或 width 时，元素的width就会设置为 min-width 的值。

trans-unit.source: The elements below have an initial color theme. They can be further themed according to the user's color scheme preference.
trans-unit.target: 下面的元素有一个初始颜色主题。它们可以根据用户的配色方案偏好进一步设置主题。

trans-unit.source: The elliptical gradient will be centered 20% from the top left, and will repeat 10 times between the center and the farthest corner (the bottom right corner). Browsers supporting multi position color stops will display a red and green striped ellipse. Browsers not supporting the syntax yet will see a gradient that goes from red to black and then from blue to green.
trans-unit.target: 椭圆渐变将以左上角为中心20%,并在中心和最远角(右下角)之间重复10次。支持多位置颜色停止的浏览器将显示一个红色和绿色的条纹椭圆。还不支持该语法的浏览器将看到一个从红色到黑色,再从蓝色到绿色的渐变。

trans-unit.source: The em is a very useful unit in CSS, since it automatically adapts its length relative to the font that the reader chooses to use.
trans-unit.target: em在CSS中是一个非常有用的单元,因为它可以根据读者选择使用的字体自动调整其长度。

trans-unit.source: The end alignment of this box's scroll snap area, within the scroll container's snapport is a snap position in this axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个框的滚动卡位区域的端部对齐,在滚动容器的卡位内就是这个轴的一个卡位。

trans-unit.source: The end color, supports both opaque colors (#RRGGBB) and colors with alpha opacity using the #AARRGGBB notation.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色同时支持不透明颜色（ #RRGGBB ）和使用 #AARRGGBB 标记的具有alpha不透明性的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The end color, supports only opaque colors in the #RRGGBB notation.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色仅支持 #RRGGBB 表示法中的不透明颜色。

trans-unit.source: The entire margin box of the element is skipped if it is an atomic inline such as an image or inline-block.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素是一个原子内联,如图像或内联块,则会跳过整个边框。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is in the update() method. It simply calls setCoords() once for each coordinate system, passing in the event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序在 update() 方法中。它只为每个坐标系调用一次 setCoords() ，并传递发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The exact details are described in the CSS3 specification.

trans-unit.source: The example adds the scroll-snap-points-y and scroll-snap-destination properties, which are deprecated, to make scroll snapping work in Firefox. We also added the scroll-snap-type property twice, once with the y axis value needed for browsers that support the new spec, and once for Firefox pre-68, which supports the property but without the y value.
trans-unit.target: 该示例添加了不推荐使用的 scroll-snap-points-y 和 scroll-snap-destination 属性，以使滚动捕捉在Firefox中有效。我们还增加了 scroll-snap-type 物业两次，一次与 y 需要支持新规范的浏览器坐标值，并一度为Firefox预-68，它支持的特性，但没有 y 值。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了一个三列轨道网格,新行以最小100像素和最大自动创建。项目已使用基于行的放置方式放置到网格上。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows an image that has been floated left, and the shape-outside property applied with a value of circle(50%). This creates a circle shape, and the content wrapping the float now wraps around that shape. This changes the length of the wrapping text's line boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了一个已向左浮动的图像，并且将 shape-outside 属性应用了一个 circle(50%) 值。这将创建一个圆形，并且包裹浮点数的内容现在将围绕该形状进行包裹。这将更改换行文本的行框的长度。

trans-unit.source: The example below shows this overflow behaviour. My multicol container has a height and there is more text than space to create columns, therefore we get columns created outside of the container.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子显示了这种溢出行为。我的 multicol 容器有一个高度,而且创建列的文字比空间多,因此我们得到在容器外创建的列。

trans-unit.target: 如果你在Firefox以外的浏览器中查看,下面的例子将无法显示出预期的效果。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates the typical problem that we have with floated layouts: if additional content is added to any one card, the layout breaks.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了我们在浮动布局中遇到的典型问题:如果在任何一张卡片上添加额外的内容,布局就会中断。

trans-unit.source: The exclusion element does not inherit its parent node's wrapping context. Its descendants are only subject to exclusion shapes defined inside the element.
trans-unit.target: 排斥元素不继承其父节点的封装上下文。它的后代只受制于元素内部定义的排除形状。

trans-unit.source: The exclusion element inherits its parent node's wrapping context. Its descendant inline content wraps around exclusions defined outside the element.
trans-unit.target: 排斥元素继承了其父节点的包装上下文。它的子代内联内容围绕着元素外定义的排除物进行包装。

trans-unit.source: The experimental grid, or flex-box content models, also create additional types of boxes.
trans-unit.target: 实验网格,或者说是弹性盒子内容模型,还可以创建额外的盒子类型。

trans-unit.source: The expression can be values combining the addition ( + ), subtraction ( - ), multiplication ( * ) and division ( / ) operators, using standard operator precedence rules. trans-unit.source: The expression can be values combining the addition ( + ), subtraction ( - ), multiplication ( * ) and division ( / ) operators, using standard operator precedence rules. Make sure to put a space on each side of the + and - operands. The operands in the expression may be any <length> syntax value. You can use different units for each value in your expression. You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.

You may also use parentheses to establish computation order when needed.

trans-unit.source: The face background color for 3-D elements that appear 3-D due to two concentric layers of surrounding border. Should be used with the ButtonText foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 由于周围边界的两个同心层而出现3-D的3-D元素的面部背景颜色。应与 ButtonText 前景色一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The face selected for a given value of font-stretch depends on the faces supported by the font in question. If the font does not provide a face that exactly matches the given value, then values less than 100% map to a narrower face, and values greater than or equal to 100% map to a wider face.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的 font-stretch 值选择的外观取决于所讨论的字体支持的外观。如果字体没有提供与给定值完全匹配的面部，则小于100％的值映射到较窄的面部，大于或等于100％的值映射到较宽的面部。

trans-unit.source: The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
trans-unit.target: 第 first baseline 的后备对齐方式是 start ， last baseline 的后备对齐方式是 end 。

trans-unit.source: The feature of flexbox that was most exciting to many of us was that it gave us proper alignment control for the first time. It made it easy to center a box on the page. Flex items can stretch to the height of the flex container, meaning that equal height columns were possible. These were things we have wanted to do for a very long time, and have come up with all kinds of hacks to accomplish, at least visually.
trans-unit.target: flexbox最让我们许多人兴奋的功能是,它第一次给了我们适当的对齐控制。它让我们可以很容易地在页面上将盒子居中。Flex项目可以拉伸到flex容器的高度,这意味着同等高度的列是可能的。这些都是我们很长时间以来一直想做的事情,并且想出了各种小技巧来实现,至少在视觉上是这样。

trans-unit.source: The feature of flexbox that was most exciting to many of us was that it gave us proper alignment control for the first time. It made it easy to center a box on the page. Flex items can stretch to the height of the flex container, meaning that equal height columns were possible. These were things we have wanted to do for a very long time, and have come up with all kinds of hacks to at least create the visual effect of.
trans-unit.target: flexbox最让我们许多人兴奋的功能是,它第一次给了我们适当的对齐控制。它让我们可以很容易地在页面上将盒子居中。Flex项目可以拉伸到flex容器的高度,这意味着同等高度的列是可能的。这些都是我们很长时间以来一直想做的事情,并且想出了各种小技巧,至少可以创造出这样的视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: The filter mechanism is extensible and enables you to develop and add filters later. For more information about filters, see Introduction to Filters and Transitions.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器机制是可扩展的，使您以后可以开发和添加过滤器。有关过滤器的更多信息，请参见过滤器和过渡简介。

trans-unit.source: The final Basic Shape is the most complex and enables the creation of many side shapes by way of creating a polygon(). This shape accepts three or more pairs of values (a polygon must at least draw a triangle). These values are co-ordinates drawn with reference to the reference box.
trans-unit.target: 最终的基本形状最复杂，并且可以通过创建 polygon() 来创建许多侧面形状。此形状接受三对或更多对值（多边形必须至少绘制一个三角形）。这些值是参考参考框绘制的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the hue of the top color, while using the saturation and luminosity of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的色相，同时使用底部颜色的饱和度和光度。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the luminosity of the top color, while using the hue and saturation of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的亮度，同时使用底部颜色的色相和饱和度。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the saturation of the top color, while using the hue and luminosity of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的饱和度，同时使用底部颜色的色相和亮度。

trans-unit.source: The final color has the hue and saturation of the top color, while using the luminosity of the bottom color.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色具有顶部颜色的色相和饱和度，同时使用底部颜色的光度。

trans-unit.source: The final color is composed of the darkest values of each color channel.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是由每个颜色通道的最暗值组成。

trans-unit.source: The final color is composed of the lightest values of each color channel.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是由每个颜色通道的最浅值组成。

trans-unit.source: The final color is similar to difference, but with less contrast.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色类似于 difference, 但对比度较低。

trans-unit.source: The final color is similar to difference, but with less contrast.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色类似于 difference ，但对比度较低。

trans-unit.source: The final color is similar to hard-light, but softer.
trans-unit.target: 最终颜色类似于 hard-light ，但更柔和。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of multiply if the bottom color is darker, or screen if the bottom color is lighter.
trans-unit.target: 如果底色较深，则最终颜色是 multiply 的结果；如果底色较浅，则最终结果是 screen 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of multiply if the top color is darker, or screen if the top color is lighter.
trans-unit.target: 如果顶部颜色较深，则最终颜色是 multiply 的结果；如果顶部颜色较浅，则最终结果是 screen 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of dividing the bottom color by the inverse of the top color.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是底部颜色除以顶部颜色的倒数的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of inverting the bottom color, dividing the value by the top color, and inverting that value.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是将底色倒置,用顶色除以该值,再将该值倒置的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of inverting the colors, multiplying them, and inverting that value.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是将颜色倒置、相乘和倒置该值的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of multiplying the top and bottom colors.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是上下颜色相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the result of subtracting the darker of the two colors from the lighter one.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是将两种颜色中较深的颜色减去较浅的颜色的结果。

trans-unit.source: The final color is the top color, regardless of what the bottom color is.
trans-unit.target: 最后的颜色是顶色,不管底色是什么。

trans-unit.source: The final example demonstrates the third possible value for writing-mode — vertical-lr. This gives you a left-to-right block flow direction and a vertical inline direction.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个例子演示了用于第三种可能的值 writing-mode - vertical-lr 。这为您提供了从左到右的块流动方向和垂直的内联方向。

trans-unit.source: The first argument to the function is the name of the custom property to be substituted. The second argument to the function, if provided, is a fallback value, which is used as the substitution value when the referenced custom property is invalid. The function only accepts two parameters, assigning everything following the first comma as the second parameter. If that second parameter is invalid, such as if a comma-separated list is provided, the fallback will fail. For example:

trans-unit.source: The float area is computed according to the shape of a float element's edges (as defined by the CSS box model). This can be margin-box, border-box, padding-box, or content-box. The shape includes any curvature created by the border-radius property (behavior which is similar to background-clip).
trans-unit.target: 浮动区域是根据浮动元素的边缘形状（由CSS box模型定义）计算的。这可以是 margin-box ， border-box ， padding-box 或 content-box 。该形状包括由 border-radius 属性（类似于 background-clip 的行为）创建的任何曲率。

trans-unit.source: The float area is computed based on the shape created by of one of inset(), circle(), ellipse(), polygon(), or as added in the level 2 specification path(). If a <shape-box> is also supplied, it defines the reference box for the <basic-shape> function. Otherwise, the reference box defaults to margin-box.
trans-unit.target: 浮动区域是根据 inset() ， circle() ， ellipse() ， polygon() 之一或在2级规范 path() 中添加的形状创建的。如果还提供了 <shape-box> ，则它定义了 <basic-shape> 函数的参考框。否则，参考框默认为 margin-box 。

trans-unit.source: The float positioning scheme for a box is selected, by setting the float CSS property on that box to a value different than none and position to static or relative. In either case, the line box is shrunk to fit alongside the float.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the -ms-scroll-chaining property in use. In this case the image container has its -ms-scroll-chaining property set to chained, which means that when a user is scrolling through a nested scrollable element and it hits its boundary the parent scrollable element will begin to scroll in the same direction. Had the -ms-scroll-chaining property been set to none, the user would observe a bounce effect when the nested element reaches its boundary. For more information, see HTML scrolling, panning and zooming sample or Internet Explorer 10 Scrolling, panning, and zooming with touch.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例说明了正在使用的 -ms-scroll-chaining 属性。在这种情况下，图像容器的 -ms-scroll-chaining property 设置为 chained ，这意味着当用户滚动浏览嵌套的可滚​​动元素并到达其边界时，父可滚动元素将开始沿相同方向滚动。如果将 -ms-scroll-chaining 属性设置为 none ，则当嵌套元素到达其边界时，用户将观察到反弹效果。有关更多信息，请参见HTML滚动，平移和缩放示例或Internet Explorer 10 触摸滚动，平移和缩放。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that it is possible to manage visibility in script. The added benefit of using content-visiblity: hidden instead of, for example, display: none is that rendered content when hidden with content-visibility will preserve rendering state. This means that if the content is shown again, it will render quicker than the alternative.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例显示可以在脚本中管理可见性。使用 content-visiblity: hidden 而不是例如 display: none 的附加好处是：当显示的内容以 content-visibility 隐藏时，呈现的内容将不会保留渲染状态。这意味着，如果再次显示内容，它将比替代内容更快地呈现。

trans-unit.target: 字体显示时间线基于一个计时器,该计时器从用户代理试图使用给定的下载字体面的那一刻开始。时间线被分为以下三个时期,这三个时期决定了使用字型的任何元素的渲染行为。

trans-unit.source: The font-size will at minimum 2ems, or twice the size of the inherited font size. We are telling it to not go below 32px if the inherited font is small. But what if the inherited font size is huge? We are setting the upper bound and twice the root em unit, but hoping the font falls between that range when it is twice the inherited font size value. This ensure it is legible and ensures accessibility
trans-unit.target: 字体大小最小为2ems,即继承字体大小的两倍。我们是告诉它,如果继承的字体很小,就不要低于32px。但是如果继承的字体大小很大怎么办?我们是设置上界和两倍的根em单位,但是希望字体在继承字体大小值的两倍时,落在这个范围之间。这样可以保证它的可读性,保证可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The font-size will at minimum be 2rems, or twice the default size of font for the page. This ensure it is legible and ensures accessibility
trans-unit.target: 字体大小至少为2rems,或页面默认字体大小的两倍。这确保了它的可读性和可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The function can be used as a track size in CSS Grid properties, where the maximum size is defined by max-content and the minimum size by auto, which is calculated similar to auto (i.e. minmax(auto, max-content)), except that the track size is clamped at argument if it is greater than the auto minimum.
trans-unit.target: 该函数可以用作CSS Grid属性中的轨道大小，其中最大大小由 max-content 定义，最小大小由 auto 定义，类似于 auto （即 minmax(auto, max-content) ）进行计算，除了如果轨道大小大于 auto 最小值，则将轨道大小限制在 argument 处。

trans-unit.source: The gradient arc is part of the circumference of the gradient. 0 degress is north, or 12:00pm. The colors of the gradient are determined by the angled color stops, their starting points, ending points, and, in between, and optional angled color-stop points. The transitions between colors can be altered with color hints between adjacent colors' color stops.
trans-unit.target: 梯度弧线是梯度周长的一部分。0度为北,或中午12点。渐变的颜色是由倾斜的颜色停止点、它们的起始点、结束点,以及在它们之间的可选倾斜颜色停止点决定的。颜色之间的过渡可以通过相邻颜色的色止点之间的颜色提示来改变。

trans-unit.source: The gradient arc is the circumference of the gradient. The starting point of the gradient or arc is north, or 12:00pm. The gradient is then rotated by the from angle. The colors of the gradient are determined by the angled color stops, their starting points, ending points, and, in between, and optional angled color-stop points. The transitions between colors can be altered with color hints between adjacent colors' color stops.
trans-unit.target: 渐变弧是渐变的周长。渐变或弧的起点是北，即12:00 pm。梯度然后通过旋转从角度。渐变的颜色由成角度的色标，其起点，终点以及中间的角度和可选的成角度的色标来确定。可以使用相邻颜色的色标之间的颜色提示来更改颜色之间的过渡。

trans-unit.source: The gradient line is defined by the center of the box containing the gradient image and by an angle. The colors of the gradient are determined by two or more points: the starting point, the ending point, and, in between, optional color-stop points.
trans-unit.target: 渐变线由包含渐变图像的方框中心和一个角度来定义。渐变线的颜色由两个或多个点决定:起点、终点,以及中间的可选颜色停止点。

trans-unit.source: The gradient line's angle of direction. A value of 0deg is equivalent to to top; increasing values rotate clockwise from there.
trans-unit.target: 渐变线的方向角。的值 0deg 相当于 to top ; 递增的值从那里顺时针旋转。

trans-unit.source: The gradient's ending shape is sized so that it exactly meets the closest corner of the box from its center.
trans-unit.target: 渐变的结尾形状的大小是为了使它正好与盒子的中心最近的角相遇。

trans-unit.source: The gradient's ending shape is sized so that it exactly meets the farthest corner of the box from its center.
trans-unit.target: 渐变的结尾形状的大小是为了使它正好与盒子的中心最远的角相遇。

trans-unit.source: The gradient's ending shape meets the side of the box closest to its center (for circles) or meets both the vertical and horizontal sides closest to the center (for ellipses).
trans-unit.target: 梯度的结尾形状与方框最接近中心的一侧相接(对于圆形),或者与最接近中心的垂直和水平两边相接(对于椭圆形)。

trans-unit.source: The gradient's ending-shape. The value can be circle (meaning that the gradient's shape is a circle with a constant radius) or ellipse (meaning that the shape is an axis-aligned ellipse). If unspecified, it defaults to ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 渐变的结束形状。值可以是 circle （表示渐变的形状是半径恒定的圆）或 ellipse （表示形状是与轴对齐的椭圆）。如果未指定，则默认为 ellipse 。

trans-unit.source: The gradient's shape. The value can be circle (meaning that the gradient's shape is a circle with constant radius) or ellipse (meaning that the shape is an axis-aligned ellipse). If unspecified, it defaults to ellipse.

trans-unit.source: The grid container doesn’t define any named grid areas.
trans-unit.target: 网格容器没有定义任何命名的网格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid in my next example has three columns and two row tracks. This means there are three tracks running down the block axis. In default writing mode, grid auto-places items starting at the top left, moving along to the right, filling up the three cells on the inline axis. It then moves onto the next line, creating a new Row track, and fills in more items:
trans-unit.target: 我下一个例子中的网格有三列和两行轨道。这意味着有三条轨道沿着块轴运行。在默认的书写模式下,grid会自动从左上角开始放置项目,沿着右边移动,填满行轴上的三个单元格。然后,它会移动到下一行,创建一个新的行轨道,并填入更多的项目。

trans-unit.source: The grid-area property can also be set to a <custom-ident> which acts as a name for the area, which can then be placed using grid-template-areas.
trans-unit.target: 也可以将grid-area属性设置为 <custom-ident> ，该名称用作该区域的名称，然后可以使用 grid-template-areas 进行放置。

trans-unit.source: The grippers are always off and default touch selection functionality is not provided.
trans-unit.target: 抓手始终处于关闭状态,不提供默认的触摸选择功能。

trans-unit.source: The grippers are always on. In addition, selection will start even if an onclick, onmsgesturetap, or onmouseup handler is present. This is the initial value.
trans-unit.target: 抓具始终处于打开状态。另外，即使存在 onclick ， onmsgesturetap 或 onmouseup 处理程序，选择也将开始。这是初始值。

trans-unit.source: The gutter is the space between the track and the bottom and right edges of the scroll box and scroll arrows of the scroll bar. The -ms-scrollbar-darkshadow-color appears outside the -ms-scrollbar-shadow-color. The track is the element of a scroll bar on which the scroll box can slide either up and down or left and right. The scroll box is the square box within a scroll bar that can be moved either up and down or left and right on a track to change the position of the content on the screen. The scroll arrows, located at each end of a scroll bar, are the square buttons containing the arrows that move the content on the screen in small increments, either up and down or left and right.
trans-unit.target: 装订线是轨道与滚动框的底部和右侧边缘以及滚动条的滚动箭头之间的空间。该 -ms-scrollbar-darkshadow-color 出现外 -ms-scrollbar-shadow-color 。轨道是滚动条的元素，滚动框可以在该滚动条上上下滑动或左右滑动。滚动框是滚动条中的方形框，可以在轨道上上下移动或左右移动以更改内容在屏幕上的位置。位于滚动条两端的滚动箭头是方形按钮，其中包含箭头，这些箭头可上下或左右移动屏幕上的内容。

trans-unit.source: The heart of the new variable fonts format is the concept of an axis of variation describing the allowable range of that particular aspect of the typeface design. So the 'weight axis' describes how light or how bold the letterforms can be; the 'width axis' describes how narrow or how wide they can be; the 'italic axis' describes if italic letterforms are present and can be turned on or off accordingly, etc. Note that an axis can be a range or a binary choice. Weight might range from 1–999, whereas italic might simply be 0 or 1 (off or on).
trans-unit.target: 新的可变字体格式的核心是变化轴的概念，它描述了字体设计该特定方面的允许范围。因此，“重量轴”描述了字母形式的轻淡或粗体。“宽度轴”描述了它们的宽度或宽度。“斜体轴”描述是否存在斜体字母形式，并且可以相应地打开或关闭斜体等。请注意，轴可以是范围或二进制选择。权重可能在1–999之间，而斜体可能只是0或1（关闭或打开）。

trans-unit.target: 悬停功能被指定为从以下列表中选择的关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The idea is that when you want to animate an element moving along a path, you previously only had animating translation, position, etc. at your disposal, which wasn't ideal and only allowed for simple movements. With offset-path you can define a specific path of any shape you want. You then animate it along that path by animating offset-distance, and can choose to rotate it at any point using offset-rotate.
trans-unit.target: 这个想法是，当您要为沿路径移动的元素设置动画时，您以前只能使用动画平移，位置等方式，这并不理想，只能进行简单的移动。使用 offset-path 您可以定义所需形状的特定路径。然后，您可以通过设置 offset-distance 的动画使其沿该路径进行动画处理，并可以选择使用 offset-rotate 在任意点旋转它。

trans-unit.source: The ideal column width, defined as a <length> or the keyword auto. The actual width may be wider or narrower to fit the available space. See column-width.
trans-unit.target: 理想的列宽，定义为 <length> 或关键字 auto 。实际宽度可以更宽或更窄以适合可用空间。请参阅 column-width 。

trans-unit.source: The ideal number of columns into which the element's content should be flowed, defined as an <integer> or the keyword auto. If neither this value nor the column's width are auto, it merely indicates the maximum allowable number of columns. See column-count.
trans-unit.target: 元素内容应流入的理想列数，定义为 <integer> 或关键字 auto 。如果此值和列的宽度都不是 auto ，则仅表示允许的最大列数。请参阅 column-count 。

trans-unit.source: The image below is a square image with a blue background. We have defined a shape using shape-outside: ellipse(40% 50%); and also used clip-path: ellipse(40% 50%); to clip away the same area that we have used to define the shape.
trans-unit.target: 下图是带有蓝色背景的正方形图像。我们使用 shape-outside: ellipse(40% 50%); 定义了形状：ellipse（40％50％）; 并且还使用了 clip-path: ellipse(40% 50%); 剪掉我们用来定义形状的相同区域。

trans-unit.source: The image below shows the media object in a non-supporting browser on the left, and a supporting one on the right:
trans-unit.target: 下图左边是不支持浏览器的媒体对象,右边是支持浏览器的媒体对象。

trans-unit.source: The image fragments can be used in url() notation as well. The #xywh=#,#,#,# media fragment syntax is 'backwards compatible' in that a media fragment will be ignored if not understood, and won't break the source call when used with url(). If the browser doesn't understand the media fragments notation, it simply ignores the fragment, displaying the entire image.
trans-unit.target: 图像片段也可以用 url() 表示法使用。所述 #xywh=#,#,#,# 媒体片段的语法是在如果不理解一个媒体片段将被忽略“向后兼容”，和当用于不会打破源呼叫 url() 。如果浏览器不了解媒体片段的表示法，它将仅忽略片段，显示整个图像。

trans-unit.source: The image is flipped horizontally (i.e., reflected) after the rotation given by the <angle> value is applied. If no <angle> is given, 0deg is used.
trans-unit.target: 在应用由 <angle> 值给出的旋转之后，图像被水平翻转（即反射）。如果未给出 <angle> ，则使用 0deg 。

trans-unit.source: The image is not repeated (and hence the background image painting area will not necessarily be entirely covered). The position of the non-repeated background image is defined by the background-position CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 图像不会重复（因此背景图像绘画区域不一定会被完全覆盖）。非重复背景图像 background-position 由background-position CSS属性定义。

trans-unit.source: The image is not repeated (and hence the mask painting area will not necessarily be entirely covered). The position of the non-repeated mask image is defined by the mask-position CSS property.
trans-unit.target: 图像不会重复（因此，蒙版绘画区域不一定会被完全覆盖）。非重复蒙版图像 mask-position 由mask-position CSS属性定义。

trans-unit.source: The image is rendered by preserving its intrinsic proportion at the largest size contained within or covering the mask positioning area. If the image has no intrinsic proportion, then it is rendered at the size of the mask positioning area.
trans-unit.target: 图像以掩模定位区域内包含的最大尺寸或覆盖掩模定位区域的最大尺寸来呈现。如果图像没有内在比例,则按掩模定位区域的大小呈现。

trans-unit.source: The image is repeated as much as needed to cover the whole background image painting area. The last image will be clipped if it doesn't fit.
trans-unit.target: 图片根据需要重复绘制,以覆盖整个背景图片绘制区域。最后一张图片如果不合适会被剪掉。

trans-unit.source: The image is repeated as much as needed to cover the whole mask painting area. The last image will be clipped if it doesn't fit.
trans-unit.target: 图像根据需要重复,以覆盖整个蒙版画区域。最后一张图片如果不合适会被剪掉。

trans-unit.source: The image is repeated as much as possible without clipping. The first and last images are pinned to either side of the element, and whitespace is distributed evenly between the images. The background-position property is ignored unless only one image can be displayed without clipping. The only case where clipping happens using space is when there isn't enough room to display one image.
trans-unit.target: 图像会被尽可能多地重复而不会剪切。第一个和最后一个图像固定在元素的任一侧，并且空白在图像之间均匀分布。该 background-position ，除非只有一个图像可以在没有限幅显示属性被忽略。使用 space 进行裁剪的唯一情况是没有足够的空间显示一张图像。

trans-unit.source: The image is repeated as much as possible without clipping. The first and last images are pinned to either side of the element, and whitespace is distributed evenly between the images. The mask-position property is ignored unless only one image can be displayed without clipping. The only case where clipping happens using space is when there isn't enough room to display one image.
trans-unit.target: 图像会被尽可能多地重复而不会剪切。第一个和最后一个图像固定在元素的任一侧，并且空白在图像之间均匀分布。的 mask-position ，除非只有一个图像可以在没有限幅显示属性被忽略。使用 space 进行裁剪的唯一情况是没有足够的空间显示一张图像。

trans-unit.source: The image must be scaled with an algorithm that preserves contrast and edges in the image, and which does not smooth colors or introduce blur to the image in the process. Suitable algorithms include nearest-neighbor and other non-smoothing scaling algorithms such as 2×SaI and hqx-family algorithms. This value is intended for pixel-art images, such as in browser games.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用一种算法缩放图像，该算法可以保留图像中的对比度和边缘，并且在处理过程中不会使颜色变平滑或对图像造成模糊。合适的算法包括最近邻算法和其他非平滑缩放算法，例如2xSaI和hqx系列算法。此值适用于像素艺术图像，例如浏览器游戏中的图像。

trans-unit.source: The image must be scaled with an algorithm that preserves contrast and edges in the image, and which does not smooth colors or introduce blur to the image in the process. Suitable algorithms include nearest-neighbor and other non-smoothing scaling algorithms such as 2×SaI and hqx-family algorithms. This value is intended for pixel-art images, such as in browser games.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用一种算法缩放图像，该算法可以保留图像中的对比度和边缘，并且在处理过程中不会使颜色变平滑或对图像造成模糊。合适的算法包括最近邻算法和其他非平滑缩放算法，例如2xSaI和hqx系列算法。此值适用于像素艺术图像，例如浏览器游戏中的图像。

trans-unit.source: The image should be scaled with an algorithm that maximizes the appearance of the image. In particular, scaling algorithms that "smooth" colors are acceptable, such as bilinear interpolation. This is intended for images such as photos.
trans-unit.target: 图像的缩放应采用能使图像外观最大化的算法。特别是,可以接受 "平滑 "颜色的缩放算法,如双线插值。这是针对照片等图像而言的。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <percentage> values was buggy in Opera prior to 11.50.
trans-unit.target: <percentage> 值的实现在11.50之前的Opera中是错误的。

trans-unit.source: The implicit and explicit grid
trans-unit.target: 隐性和显性网格

trans-unit.source: The inset-inline-end property takes the same values as the left property.
trans-unit.target: 中 set-inline-end 属性采用相同的值作为 left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The inconsistent spacing between words created by justified text can be problematic for people with cognitive concerns such as Dyslexia.
trans-unit.target: 合理的文字所造成的字与字之间的间距不一致,对于有认知问题的人来说是个问题,例如阅读障碍。

trans-unit.source: The individual pages for the different types of value that display can have set on it feature multiple examples of those values in action — see the Syntax section.
trans-unit.target: 可以在其上设置的 display 不同类型的值的各个页面上都有这些值的多个示例在起作用-请参见“ 语法”部分。

trans-unit.source: The individual pages for the different types of value that display can have set on it feature multiple examples of those values in action — see the Syntax section. In addition, see the following material, which covers the various values of display in depth.
trans-unit.target: 可以在其上设置的用于 display 不同类型的值的各个页面上有这些值的多个示例在起作用-请参见“语法”部分。此外，请参见以下材料，其中涵盖了深度显示的各种值。

trans-unit.source: The individual property pages detail the browser compatibility situation for Scroll Snap. Note that at the present time Firefox still implements an old version of the specification. Read the guide to browser compatibility for an overview of how to support both the old and new specification.
trans-unit.target: 各个属性页详细介绍了Scroll Snap的浏览器兼容性情况。请注意，目前Firefox仍实现该规范的旧版本。阅读有关浏览器兼容性的指南，以概述如何同时支持旧规范和新规范。

trans-unit.source: The individual property pages detail the browser compatibility situation for Scroll Snap. Note that prior to Firefox 68, Firefox implemented an old version of the specification. Read the next guide for an overview of how to write cross-browser compatible code that supports both the old and new specification.
trans-unit.target: 各个属性页详细介绍了Scroll Snap的浏览器兼容性情况。请注意，在Firefox 68之前，Firefox实施了该规范的旧版本。阅读下一指南，概述如何编写支持旧规范和新规范的跨浏览器兼容代码。

trans-unit.source: The individual text-decoration properties are text-decoration-line, text-decoration-color, and text-decoration-style.
trans-unit.target: 各个文本装饰属性为 text-decoration-line ， text-decoration-color 和 text-decoration-style 。

trans-unit.source: The initial Shapes specification included a property shape-inside for creating shapes inside an element. This property, along with the possibility of creating shapes on non-floated elements, has been moved to level 2 of the specification. As the shape-inside property was initially in Level 1 of the specification, you may find tutorials on the web detailing both properties.
trans-unit.target: 最初的Shapes规范包括一个 shape-inside 属性，用于在元素内部创建形状。此属性以及在非浮动元素上创建形状的可能性已移至规范的第2级。由于 shape-inside 属性最初是在规范的1级中，因此您可以在网上找到详细介绍这两个属性的教程。

trans-unit.source: The initial position is the position of the box specified by the position property.
trans-unit.target: 初始位置是由 position 属性指定的框的位置。

trans-unit.source: The initial value for align-self and justify-self is stretch so the item will stretch over the entire grid area. The exception to this rule is where the item has an intrinsic aspect ratio, for example an image. In this case the item will be aligned to start in both dimensions in order that the image is not distorted.
trans-unit.target: 对于初始值 align-self 和 justify-self 的 stretch 使该项目将延伸在整个网格区域。该规则的例外是项目具有固有的长宽比，例如图像。在这种情况下，该项目将被对准 start 在两个维度上，以使图像不失真。

trans-unit.source: The initial value for this property is stretch and this is why flex items stretch to the height of the tallest one by default. They are in fact stretching to fill the flex container — the tallest item is defining the height of that.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的初始值是 stretch ，这就是为什么弹性项目默认拉伸到最高项目的高度的原因。实际上，它们正在拉伸以填充flex容器-最高的项目定义了容器的高度。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of column-gap in multicol is 1em. This means your columns will not run into each other. In other layout methods the initial value for column-gap is 0. If you use the keyword value “normal” the gap will be set to 1em.
trans-unit.target: multicol 中 column-gap 的初始值为 1em 。这意味着您的列不会互相碰到。在其他布局方法中， column-gap 的初始值为0。如果使用关键字值“ normal”，则间隙将设置为1em。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of all elements except the top-level element. The element is not zoomable.
trans-unit.target: 除顶层元素外,所有元素的初始值。该元素不可缩放。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of multicol for column-fill is balance. The value of balance means all columns are as balanced as is possible. In fragmented contexts such as Paged Media, only the last fragment is balanced. This means that on the last page the final set of column boxes will be balanced.
trans-unit.target: MULTICOL为初始值 column-fill 是 balance 。平衡值表示所有列均尽可能平衡。在诸如分页媒体之类的分散上下文中，只有最后一个片段是平衡的。这意味着在最后一页上，最后一组列框将保持平衡。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the flex-wrap property is nowrap. This means that if you have a set of flex items that are too wide for their container, they will overflow it. If you want to cause them to wrap once they become too wide you must add the flex-wrap property with a value of wrap, or use the shorthand flex-flow with values of row wrap or column wrap.
trans-unit.target: flex-wrap 属性的初始值为 nowrap 。这意味着，如果您有一组伸缩项目对于它们的容器来说太宽了，它们就会溢出。如果你想使他们包裹一旦成为太宽，你必须添加 flex-wrap 用的价值属性 wrap ，或使用简短的 flex-flow 与值 row wrap 或 column wrap 。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the top-level element. The element is zoomable.
trans-unit.target: 顶层元素的初始值。该元素是可以缩放的。

trans-unit.source: The initial value. A bounce effect is shown when the user hits a zoom limit during page manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 初始值。当用户在页面操作过程中触及到缩放极限时,会出现弹跳效果。

trans-unit.source: The initial value. Same as inherit.
trans-unit.target: 初始值。与 inherit 相同。

trans-unit.source: The initial value. The value is inherited from the element's parent element.
trans-unit.target: 初始值。该值由元素的父元素继承。

trans-unit.source: The initial version of CSS defined a set of useful counter styles. However, although more styles were added to this set of predefined styles over the years, this system proved too restrictive to fulfill the needs of worldwide typography. The @counter-style at-rule addresses this shortcoming in an open-ended manner, by allowing authors to define their own counter styles when the pre-defined styles aren't fitting their needs.
trans-unit.target: CSS的初始版本定义了一组有用的计数器样式。但是，尽管这些年来，在这组预定义样式中添加了更多样式，但是事实证明，该系统过于严格，无法满足全球排版的需求。在 @counter-style 在规则解决了这个缺点，在开放式的方式，通过允许作者在预先定义的样式不适合他们的需要定义自己的柜台风格。

trans-unit.source: The inline axis is the axis that corresponds to the direction that words in a sentence would run in the writing mode used. Therefore, in a horizontal language such as English or Arabic the inline direction runs horizontally. Should you be in a vertical writing mode the inline axis will run vertically.
trans-unit.target: 内联轴是对应于句子中的单词在所使用的书写模式下的运行方向的轴。因此,在水平语言中,如英语或阿拉伯语,内联轴的方向是水平的。如果您是在垂直写作模式下,内联轴将垂直运行。

trans-unit.source: The inline contents are aligned to the left edge of the line box.
trans-unit.target: 内行内容与行框的左边缘对齐。

trans-unit.source: The inline contents are aligned to the right edge of the line box.
trans-unit.target: 内行内容与行框的右边缘对齐。

trans-unit.source: The inline contents are centered within the line box.
trans-unit.target: 内联内容在行框内居中。

trans-unit.source: The inline contents are justified. Text should be spaced to line up its left and right edges to the left and right edges of the line box, except for the last line.
trans-unit.target: 行内内容都是对齐的。除最后一行外,文字的间距应使其左右边缘与行框的左右边缘对齐。

trans-unit.source: The input method editor is disabled and may not be activated by the user.
trans-unit.target: 输入法编辑器被禁用,用户可能无法激活。

trans-unit.source: The input method editor is initially active; text entry is performed through it unless the user specifically dismisses it. Not supported on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 输入法编辑器最初处于活动状态；除非用户明确将其删除，否则将通过它执行文本输入。Linux不支持。

trans-unit.source: The input method editor is initially inactive, but the user may activate it if they wish. Not supported on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 输入法编辑器最初是不活动的，但是用户可以根据需要将其激活。Linux不支持。

trans-unit.source: The interactions between block-level and inline-level boxes are described in the MDN documentation for display.
trans-unit.target: MDN文档中对 display 块级框和嵌入式级框之间的交互进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: The interpretation of possible values depends on the image's intrinsic dimensions (width and height) and intrinsic proportion (ratio of width and height). A bitmap image always has intrinsic dimensions and an intrinsic proportion. A vector image may have both intrinsic dimensions and thus it has an intrinsic proportion too. It also may have one or no intrinsic dimensions and in either case it might or might not have an intrinsic proportion. Gradients are treated as images with no intrinsic dimensions or intrinsic proportion.
trans-unit.target: 可能值的解释取决于图像的内在尺寸(宽度和高度)和内在比例(宽度和高度的比例)。一个位图图像总是有固有的尺寸和固有的比例。矢量图像可能有两个固有尺寸,因此它也有一个固有比例。它也可能只有一个或没有固有尺寸,在这两种情况下,它可能有也可能没有固有比例。梯度被视为没有内在尺寸或内在比例的图像。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic minimum max-height.
trans-unit.target: 固有最小 max-height 。

trans-unit.target: 固有最小 max-width 。

trans-unit.target: 固有最小 min-height 。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic minimum min-width.
trans-unit.target: 固有最小 min-width 。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic minimum height.
trans-unit.target: 固有的最小高度。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic minimum width.
trans-unit.target: 固有的最小宽度。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic preferred max-height.
trans-unit.target: 固有的首选 max-height 。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic preferred max-width.
trans-unit.target: 固有的首选 max-width 。

trans-unit.target: 固有的首选 min-width 。

trans-unit.target: 内在的首选高度。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic preferred width.

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic size contributions of the track may be adjusted to the size of the grid container and increase the final size of the track by the minimum amount that would result in honoring the percentage.
trans-unit.target: 轨道的内在尺寸贡献可根据网格容器的尺寸进行调整,并将轨道的最终尺寸增加到能导致兑现百分比的最小量。

trans-unit.source: The italicized version of this text uses the same glyphs present in the unstyled version, but they are artificially sloped by a few degrees.
trans-unit.target: 这段文字的斜体版使用的字形与无字版相同,但它们被人为地倾斜了几度。

trans-unit.source: The item box2 is now overlapping box1, it displays on top as it comes later in the source order.
trans-unit.target: 项目 box2 现在与 box1 重叠，它在源顺序的后面显示在顶部。

trans-unit.source: The item is given the specified proportion of the free space in the container. This is equivalent to setting "flex: <positive-number> 1 0".
trans-unit.target: 给该项目指定的容器中可用空间的比例。这等效于设置“ flex: <positive-number> 1 0 ”。

trans-unit.source: The item is packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's main-end or cross-end side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的主端或横端侧,物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The item is packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's main-start or cross-start side.
trans-unit.target: 根据挠性容器的主起动或横起动一侧,物品向对齐容器的边缘互相平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The item is packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品以适当的轴线向对准容器的端缘互相平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The item is packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上向对准容器的起始边缘相互平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The item is packed flush to the edge of the alignment container of the end side of the item, in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上,与物品端面的对齐容器边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The item is packed flush to the edge of the alignment container of the start side of the item, in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上,与物品起始面的对齐容器边缘齐平包装。

trans-unit.source: The item is sized according to its width and height properties, but grows to absorb any extra free space in the flex container, and shrinks to its minimum size to fit the container. This is equivalent to setting "flex: 1 1 auto".
trans-unit.target: 物品的尺寸根据其 width 和 height 属性而定，但会增长以吸收弹性容器中的任何额外自由空间，并会收缩至其最小尺寸以适合容器。这等效于设置“ flex: 1 1 auto ”。

trans-unit.source: The item is sized according to its width and height properties. It is fully inflexible: it neither shrinks nor grows in relation to the flex container. This is equivalent to setting "flex: 0 0 auto".
trans-unit.target: 根据其 width 和 height 属性调整大小。它是完全不灵活的：相对于flex容器，它既不收缩也不增长。这等效于设置“ flex: 0 0 auto ”。

trans-unit.source: The item is sized according to its width and height properties. It shrinks to its minimum size to fit the container, but does not grow to absorb any extra free space in the flex container. This is equivalent to setting "flex: 0 1 auto".
trans-unit.target: 该项目的大小根据其 width 和 height 属性而定。它会收缩到最小尺寸以适合容器，但不会增长以吸收flex容器中的任何额外自由空间。这等效于设置“ flex: 0 1 auto ”。

trans-unit.source: The item/column can be resized horizontally. Often rendered as arrows pointing left and right with a vertical bar separating them.
trans-unit.target: 项目/列可以水平调整大小。通常显示为指向左右的箭头,中间用竖条分隔。

trans-unit.source: The item/row can be resized vertically. Often rendered as arrows pointing up and down with a horizontal bar separating them.
trans-unit.target: 项目/行可以垂直调整大小。通常显示为上下箭头,中间用横条隔开。

trans-unit.source: The items are displayed in what is described in the specification as order-modified document order. The value of the order property is taken into account before the items are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这些项目以规范中描述的顺序修改的文档订单显示。在显示项目之前，将考虑order属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the cross axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The empty space before the first and after the last item equals half of the space between each pair of adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿横轴均匀分布。每对相邻物品之间的间距是相同的。第一个和最后一个项目之前和之后的空隙等于每对相邻项目之间空间的一半。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the cross axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the main-start edge, and the last item is flush with the main-end edge.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿横轴均匀分布。每对相邻物品之间的间距是相同的。第一个项目与主起点边缘齐平,最后一个项目与主终点边缘齐平。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the cross axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the start edge of the alignment container in the cross axis, and the last item is flush with the end edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿横轴均匀分布。每对相邻物品之间的间距是相同的。第一个项目在横轴上与对齐容器的起始边缘齐平,最后一个项目在横轴上与对齐容器的末端边缘齐平。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the cross axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿横轴均匀分布。每一对相邻物品之间的间距,主起始边和第一个物品,主结束边和最后一个物品,都是完全相同的。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the cross axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the start edge and the first item, and the end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿横轴均匀分布。每一对相邻物品之间的间距,起始边缘和第一个物品,以及结束边缘和最后一个物品,都是完全相同的。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The empty space before the first and after the last item equals half of the space between each pair of adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对准容器内沿主轴均匀分布。每对相邻物品之间的间距是相同的。第一个和最后一个项目之前和之后的空隙等于每对相邻项目之间空间的一半。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the main-start edge, and the last item is flush with the main-end edge.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对准容器内沿主轴均匀分布。每对相邻物品之间的间距是相同的。第一个项目与主起点边缘齐平,最后一个项目与主终点边缘齐平。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿主轴线均匀分布。每一对相邻物品之间的间距,主起始边和第一个物品,主结束边和最后一个物品,都是完全相同的。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the masonry axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The empty space before the first and after the last item equals half of the space between each pair of adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 物品沿砌筑轴线均匀分布在对齐容器内。每对相邻项目之间的间距是相同的。第一个和最后一个项目之前和之后的空隙等于每对相邻项目之间空间的一半。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the masonry axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the main-start edge, and the last item is flush with the main-end edge.
trans-unit.target: 物品沿砌筑轴线均匀分布在对齐容器内。每对相邻项之间的间距是相同的。第一个项目与主始边齐平,最后一个项目与主端边齐平。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the masonry axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内沿砌筑轴线均匀分布。每一对相邻项之间的间距,主始边与第一个项之间,主终边与最后一个项之间的间距都是完全相同的。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The empty space before the first and after the last item equals half of the space between each pair of adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内均匀分布。每对相邻项目之间的间距是相同的。第一项和最后一项之前的空隙等于每对相邻项之间空隙的一半。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the main-start edge, and the last item is flush with the main-end edge.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对齐容器内均匀分布。每对相邻物品之间的间距是相同的。第一个项目与主起始边缘齐平,最后一个项目与主末端边缘齐平。

trans-unit.source: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
trans-unit.target: 项目在对齐容器内均匀分布。每一对相邻物品之间的间距,主起始边和第一个物品,主结束边和最后一个物品,都是完全相同的。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other against the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's cross-end side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的横端面,物品与对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other against the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's cross-start side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的交叉启动面,物品与对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other against the end edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在横轴上对准容器的端缘相互平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other against the start edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在横轴上对准容器的起始边缘相互平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other in the center of the alignment container along the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在对准容器中心沿十字轴线相互平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the center of the alignment container along the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品沿十字轴线向对准容器的中心方向平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the center of the alignment container along the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品沿主轴向对准容器中心平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the center of the alignment container along the masonry axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品沿砌筑轴线向对准容器中心平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the center of the alignment container.
trans-unit.target: 物品向着对齐容器的中心平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the center of the of the alignment container.
trans-unit.target: 容器的中心位置,物品之间是平齐的。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's cross-end side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的横端面,将物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's cross-start side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的交叉启动面,物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's main-end or cross-end side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的主端或横端侧,物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's main-end side.
trans-unit.target: 根据挠性容器的主端面,物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's main-start or cross-start side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的主启动或交叉启动侧,物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the edge of the alignment container depending on the flex container's main-start side.
trans-unit.target: 根据柔性容器的主启动侧,物品向对齐容器的边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上向对准容器的端缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在横轴上向对准容器的端缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在主轴上向对准容器的端缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the masonry axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在砌筑轴线上向对准容器的端缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the left edge of the alignment container.
trans-unit.target: 物品向着对齐容器的左侧边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the left edge of the alignment container. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.
trans-unit.target: 物品朝着对齐容器的左边缘彼此齐平包装。如果属性的轴与内联轴不平行，则此值的行为类似于 start 。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the right edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上朝着对齐容器的右边缘彼此齐平包装。如果属性的轴与内联轴不平行，则此值的行为类似于 start 。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the right edge of the alignment container.
trans-unit.target: 物品向着对齐容器的右侧边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上向着对齐容器的起始边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在横轴上向对准容器的起始边缘相互平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在主轴上向对准容器的起始边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the masonry axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在砌筑轴线上向对准容器的起始边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to the edge of the alignment container of the end side of the item, in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上,与物品端面的对齐容器边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed flush to the edge of the alignment container of the start side of the item, in the appropriate axis.
trans-unit.target: 物品在适当的轴线上,与物品起始面的对齐容器边缘平齐包装。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed in their default position as if no align-content value was set.
trans-unit.target: 像未设置 align-content 值一样，将项目打包在其默认位置。

trans-unit.source: The items are packed in their default position as if no justify-content value was set. This value behaves as stretch in grid and flex containers.
trans-unit.target: 将项目打包在其默认位置，就好像未设置 justify-content 值一样。该值在网格和伸缩容器中表现为 stretch 。

trans-unit.source: The items do not stretch on the main dimension, but can shrink.
trans-unit.target: 物品在主维度上不拉伸,但可以收缩。

trans-unit.source: The items start from the start edge of the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 项目从主轴的起始边缘开始。

trans-unit.source: The items stretch along the masonry axis to fill the content box. Items with definite size do not stretch.
trans-unit.target: 项目沿着砖石轴拉伸以填充内容框。有确定尺寸的项目不会被拉伸。

trans-unit.source: The items will stretch to fill the size of the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 这些项目将被拉伸以填充横轴的大小。

trans-unit.source: The kanjis are designed so that they can't be modified to look like another correct one
trans-unit.target: 坎儿井的设计使它们不能被修改成另一个正确的样子。

trans-unit.source: The key properties of the Scroll Snap specification are scroll-snap-type and scroll-snap-align. The scroll-snap-type property is used on the scroll container to state the type and direction of scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Scroll Snap规范的关键属性是 scroll-snap-type 和 scroll-snap-align 。该 scroll-snap-type 属性用于在上滚动容器陈述类型和滚动的方向。

trans-unit.source: The key thing to remember when placing items by line number, is that line 1 is the start line, no matter which writing mode you are in. Line -1 is the end line, no matter which writing mode you are in.
trans-unit.target: 当按行号放置项目时,要记住的关键一点是,无论你处于哪种写作模式,第1行都是起始行;第-1行是结束行,无论你处于哪种写作模式。第-1行是结束行,无论你处于哪种书写模式。

trans-unit.source: The key to really understanding how flex item sizing works is in understanding the number of things that come into play. Consider the following aspects, which we have already discussed in these guides:
trans-unit.target: 要真正理解柔性项目尺寸如何工作,关键在于理解发挥作用的事情的数量。考虑以下几个方面,我们已经在这些指南中讨论过。

trans-unit.source: The keyframes are defined using the @keyframes at-rule. In this case, we have just two keyframes. The first occurs at 0% (using the alias from). Here, we configure the left margin of the element to be at 100% (that is, at the far right edge of the containing element), and the width of the element to be 300% (or three times the width of the containing element). This causes the first frame of the animation to have the header drawn off the right edge of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧是使用 @keyframes 规则定义的。在这种情况下，我们只有两个关键帧。第一次发生在0％（使用 from 的别名）。在这里，我们将元素的左边距配置为100％（即，包含元素的最右边），并将元素的宽度配置为300％（或包含元素的宽度的三倍） ）。这将导致动画的第一帧的标题从浏览器窗口的右边缘绘制。

trans-unit.source: The keyword closest-side uses the length from the center of the shape to the closest side of the reference box. For circles, this is the closest side in any dimension. For ellipses, this is the closest side in the radius dimension.
trans-unit.target: 关键字 closest-side 使用从形状中心到参考框最近侧的长度。对于圆，这是任何尺寸中最接近的一面。对于椭圆，这是半径尺寸中最接近的边。

trans-unit.source: The keyword farthest-side uses the length from the center of the shape to the farthest side of the reference box. For circles, this is the farthest side in any dimension. For ellipses, this is the farthest side in the radius dimension.
trans-unit.target: 关键字 farthest-side 使用从形状中心到参考框最远侧的长度。对于圆来说，这是任何维度上最远的一面。对于椭圆，这是半径尺寸中最远的一侧。

trans-unit.source: The keyword value center, which centers the image.
trans-unit.target: 关键字值 center ，使图像居中。

trans-unit.source: The keyword value fixed along with an integer.
trans-unit.target: 关键字值与整数一起 fixed 。

trans-unit.source: The keyword value none.
trans-unit.target: 关键字值 none 。

trans-unit.source: The keyword value of both for the resize property works whether you are thinking physically or logically. It sets both dimensions at once. Try playing with the below example.
trans-unit.target: 无论您是在物理上还是在逻辑上进行思考， both 可以通过resize属性使用二者的关键字值。它一次设置两个尺寸。尝试使用以下示例。

trans-unit.source: The keyword value or extends along with a @counter-style name.
trans-unit.target: 关键字值或与 @counter-style 名称一起 extends 。

trans-unit.source: The keyword values are center, top, right, bottom, and left. Each keyword represents either an edge of the element's box or the center line between two edges. Depending on the context, center represents either the center between the left and right edges, or the center between the top and bottom edges.
trans-unit.target: 关键字值为 center ， top ， right ， bottom 和 left 。每个关键字代表元素框的边缘或两个边缘之间的中心线。根据上下文， center 表示左右边缘之间的中心，或者上下边缘之间的中心。

trans-unit.source: The keyword values of closest-side and farthest-side are useful to create a quick ellipse based on the size of the floated element reference box.
trans-unit.target: closest-side 和 farthest-side 的关键字值可用于根据浮动元素参考框的大小创建快速椭圆。

trans-unit.source: The keywords are convenience shorthands and match the following <percentage> values:
trans-unit.target: 关键字是便捷的简写，并且与以下 <percentage> 值匹配：

trans-unit.source: The keywords in the following list are defined by the CSS Color Module Level 4 specification.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中的关键字由CSS颜色模块第4级规范定义。

trans-unit.source: The language is defined by the lang HTML attribute or the xml:lang XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该语言由 lang HTML属性或 xml:lang XML属性定义。

trans-unit.source: The larger of:
trans-unit.target: 其中较大的:

trans-unit.source: The largest allowed zoom factor. A zoom factor of 100% corresponds to no zooming. Larger values zoom in. Smaller values zoom out.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最大缩放系数。100%的缩放系数对应于不缩放。较大的数值会放大。较小的值会放大,较小的值会缩小。

trans-unit.source: The last one is ignored (on a screen), and the first two have the same selector, hence the same specificity. Therefore, it is the last one that is then selected:
trans-unit.target: 最后一个被忽略(在屏幕上),而前两个有相同的选择器,因此有相同的特异性。因此,当时选择的是最后一个。

trans-unit.source: The last rule selects all links within an element with the class my-class-3 and sets their color to unset — we unset the value. Because the color property is a naturally inherited property it acts exactly like setting the value to inherit. As a consequence, this link is set to the same color as the body — green.
trans-unit.target: 最后一条规则选择 my-class-3 类的元素中的所有链接，并将它们的颜色 unset 为unset-我们取消设置该值。因为color属性是一个自然继承的属性，所以它的行为就像设置要 inherit 的值一样。因此，此链接设置为与主体相同的颜色-绿色。

trans-unit.source: The layout container will be a containing block for absolute/fixed position descendants.
trans-unit.target: 布局容器将是 absolute / fixed 位置后代的包含块。

trans-unit.source: The layout may change dynamically according to the usual rules of CSS, and the output device is not unusually constrained in speed, so regularly-updating things like CSS Animations can be used. Example: computer screens.
trans-unit.target: 布局可能会根据CSS的常规规则动态更改，并且输出设备的速度不会受到异常限制，因此可以使用CSS动画之类的定期更新内容。示例：计算机屏幕。

trans-unit.source: The layout may change dynamically according to the usual rules of CSS, but the output device is not able to render or display changes quickly enough for them to be perceived as a smooth animation. Examples: e-book readers or severely underpowered devices.
trans-unit.target: 布局可能会根据CSS的通常规则动态变化,但输出设备无法快速渲染或显示变化,无法将其视为流畅的动画。例如:电子书阅读器或功率严重不足的设备。

trans-unit.source: The layout viewport and visual viewport described above are not the only viewport you will encounter. Any sub-viewport that is fully or partially displayed within the layout viewport is considered a visual viewport.
trans-unit.target: 上面描述的布局视口和可视视口并不是您将遇到的唯一视口。任何完全或部分显示在布局视口中的子视口都被视为可视视口。

trans-unit.source: The length of the gradient that repeats is the distance between the first and last color stop. If the first color does not have a color-stop-length, the color-stop-length defaults to 0. With each repetition, the positions of the color stops are shifted by a multiple of the length of the basic linear gradient. Thus, the position of each ending color stop coincides with a starting color stop; if the color values are different, this will result in a sharp visual transition. This can be altered with repeating the first color again as the last color.
trans-unit.target: 重复的渐变长度是第一个颜色和最后一个颜色停止点之间的距离。如果第一种颜色没有颜色停顿长度,颜色停顿长度默认为0。 每次重复时,颜色停顿的位置会以基本线性渐变长度的倍数移动。因此,每个结束颜色停止点的位置与开始颜色停止点的位置一致;如果颜色值不同,将导致一个清晰的视觉过渡。这可以通过再次重复第一种颜色作为最后一种颜色来改变。

trans-unit.source: The length or percentage before the keywords, if both are present. If several keywords are present, they appear in the same order as their appearance in the formal grammar.
trans-unit.target: 关键字前的长度或百分比,如果两者都存在。如果有几个关键词,它们的出现顺序与正式语法中的出现顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: The live example below allows you to test out the different values of the flex shorthand; remember that the first value is flex-grow. Giving this a positive value means the item can grow. The second is flex-shrink — with a positive value the items can shrink, but only if their total values overflow the main axis. The final value is flex-basis; this is the value the items are using as their base value to grow and shrink from.
trans-unit.target: 下面的实时示例使您可以测试flex速记的不同值；请记住，第一个值是 flex-grow 。赋予正值表示该商品可以增长。第二个是 flex-shrink -值为正值时，项目可以收缩，但前提是它们的总值超出主轴。最终值为 flex-basis ；这是项目使用的值作为增长和收缩的基础值。

trans-unit.source: The live example below demonstrates use of the vertical-align property along with display: inline-block. Both display: table-cell and display: inline-block allow for the use of this property. Use of vertical-align enables vertical alignment prior to flexbox. The property is ignored by flexbox and so you can use it in conjunction with display: table-cell or display: inline-block as a fallback and then safely use box alignment properties in flexbox instead.
trans-unit.target: 下面的实时示例演示了 vertical-align 属性和 display: inline-block 。两者 display: table-cell 和 display: inline-block 允许使用该属性的。使用 vertical-align 可以在flexbox之前进行垂直对齐。该属性会被flexbox忽略，因此您可以将其与 display: table-cell 或 display: inline-block 结合使用，作为后备，然后安全地在flexbox中使用框对齐属性。

trans-unit.source: The live example below has flex-direction set to row-reverse. Try the other values — row, column and column-reverse — to see what happens to the content.

trans-unit.source: The majority of issues with flexbox relate to the changes in the specification, as it has been developed, and the fact that many of us were attempting to use an experimental specification in production. If you are trying to ensure backwards compatibility with old versions of browsers, and in particular IE10 and 11, the Flexbugs site is a helpful resource. You will see that many of the listed bugs apply to old browser versions and are fixed in current browsers. Each of the bugs has a workaround listed — which can save you many hours of puzzling.
trans-unit.target: flexbox的大多数问题与规范的变更有关，因为它已经被开发出来，而且我们中的许多人都试图在生产中使用实验性规范。如果您要确保与旧版本的浏览器（尤其是IE10和11）向后兼容，则Flexbugs网站是一个有用的资源。您将看到许多列出的bug都适用于旧的浏览器版本，并且在当前的浏览器中已修复。每个错误都有列出的解决方法-可以节省许多时间。

trans-unit.source: The most common case where an anonymous inline box is created, is when some text is found as a direct child of a block box creating an inline formatting context. In that case, this text is included in the largest possible anonymous inline box. Also, space content, which would be removed by the behavior set in the white-space CSS property, does not generate anonymous inline boxes because they would end empty.
trans-unit.target: 创建匿名内联框的最常见情况是，找到某些文本作为创建内联格式设置上下文的阻止框的直接子级。在这种情况下，此文本将包含在最大的匿名内联框中。同样，空格内容（将通过在 white-space CSS属性中设置的行为删除）不会生成匿名内联框，因为它们将以空结尾。

trans-unit.source: The most common movie format since the 1960s.
trans-unit.target: 60年代以来最常见的电影格式。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage is to disable all gestures on an element (and its non-scrollable descendants) that provides its own dragging and zooming behavior – such as a map or game surface.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的用法是禁用提供其自身拖动和缩放行为的元素（及其不可滚动的后代）上的所有手势-例如地图或游戏表面。

trans-unit.source: The most obvious use of this is to put a class name only on certain custom element instances, and then include the relevant class selector as the function argument. You can't use this with a descendant selector expression to select only instances of the custom element that are inside a particular ancestor. That's the job of :host-context().
trans-unit.target: 最明显的用途是仅在某些自定义元素实例上放置一个类名，然后将相关的类选择器作为函数参数包含在内。您不能将其与后代选择器表达式一起使用，以仅选择特定祖先内的自定义元素的实例。那就是 :host-context() 的工作。

trans-unit.source: The most relevant part here is scroll-snap-align: end, which specifies that the right-hand edges (the "ends" along the x axis, in our case) are the designated snap points.
trans-unit.target: 这里最相关的部分是 scroll-snap-align: end ，它指定右边缘（在我们的例子中，沿x轴的“端点”）是指定的捕捉点。

trans-unit.source: The most relevant part here is scroll-snap-align: start, which specifies that the left-hand edges (the "starts" along the x axis, in our case) are the designated snap points.
trans-unit.target: 这里最相关的部分是 scroll-snap-align: start ，它指定左侧边缘（在我们的例子中，沿x轴的“起点”）是指定的捕捉点。

trans-unit.source: The most straightforward answer to this question is defined in the specifications themselves. Flexbox is a one-dimensional layout method whereas Grid Layout is a two-dimensional layout method. The example below has a flex layout. As already described in the Basic concepts article, flex items can be allowed to wrap but, once they do so, each line becomes a flex container of its own. When space is distributed flexbox does not look at the placement of items in other rows and tries to line things up with each other.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题最直接的答案在规范本身就有定义。Flexbox是一种一维布局方式,而Grid Layout是一种二维布局方式。下面的例子就采用了flex布局。在基本概念一文中已经介绍过了,flex项可以允许环绕,但是,一旦环绕,每一行都会成为自己的flex容器。当空间分布时,flexbox并不看其他行中物品的位置,而是尝试将东西互相排开。

trans-unit.source: The motion aspect in CSS Motion Path typically comes from animating the offset-distance property. If you want to animate an element along its full path, you would define its offset-path and then set up an animation that takes the offset-distance from 0% to 100%.
trans-unit.target: CSS运动路径中的运动方面通常来自对 offset-distance 属性进行动画处理。如果要沿元素的完整路径设置动画，则可以定义其 offset-path ，然后设置一个动画，将 offset-distance 从 0% 转换为 100% 。

trans-unit.source: The name of a font family. For example, "Times" and "Helvetica" are font families. Font family names containing whitespace should be quoted.

trans-unit.source: The name of another counter style, specified as a <custom-ident>. If included, the counter will be spoken out in the form specified in that counter style, kind of like specifying the fallback descriptor. If the specified style does not exist, speak-as defaults to auto.

trans-unit.source: The nearest SVG viewport is used as the reference box. trans-unit.source: The next example is the same setup, however we are using subgrid as the value of grid-template-rows and defining explicit column tracks. So the column tracks behave as a regular nested grid, but the rows are tied to the two tracks that the child spans.
trans-unit.target: 下一个示例是相同的设置，但是我们将 subgrid 用作 grid-template-rows 的值，并定义了显式的列轨道。因此，列轨道的行为就像一个常规的嵌套网格，但是行绑定到了子跨越的两个轨道上。

trans-unit.source: The next task is to actually add the keyframes to the page's CSS. The first thing to do is look to see if there's already a style sheet on the document; if so, we simply insert the keyframe description into that stylesheet; this is done in lines 13-15.

trans-unit.source: The non-step keyword values (ease, linear, ease-in-out, etc.) each represent cubic Bézier curve with fixed four point values, with the cubic-bezier() function value allowing for a non-predefined value. The step timing functions divides the input time into a specified number of intervals that are equal in length. It is defined by a number of steps and a step position.

trans-unit.source: The order within each animation definition is also important for distinguishing animation-name values from other keywords. Furthermore, when serialized, default values of other properties must be output in at least the cases necessary to distinguish an animation-name that could be a value of another property, and may be output in additional cases.

trans-unit.source: The overflow property is in reality a shorthand for the overflow-x and overflow-y properties. If you specify only one value for overflow, this value is used for both axes. However, you can specify both values in which case the first is used for overflow-x and therefore the horizontal direction, and the second for overflow-y and the vertical direction. In the below example, I have only specified overflow-y: scroll so we do not get the unwanted horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，overflow属性是 overflow-x 和 overflow-y 属性的简写。如果仅为溢出指定一个值，则该值将用于两个轴。但是，您可以指定两个值，在这种情况下，第一个值用于 overflow-x ，因此用于水平方向，第二个值用于 overflow-y 和垂直方向。在下面的示例中，我仅指定了 overflow-y: scroll 因此我们不会得到不需要的水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The overflow that we sometimes need to manage in CSS is described as scrollable overflow. This is the content appearing outside of the box for which scrolling mechanisms need to be provided. The overflow properties are how we can control what happens when content overflows a box.
trans-unit.target: 我们有时需要在CSS中管理的溢出称为可滚动溢出。这是出现在框外的内容，需要为其提供滚动机制。溢出属性是我们如何控制内容溢出框时发生的情况。

trans-unit.source: The percentage is calculated with respect to the height of the generated box's containing block. trans-unit.source: The percentage is calculated with respect to the height of the generated box's containing block. If the height of the containing block is not specified explicitly (i.e., it depends on content height), and this element is not absolutely positioned, the value computes to auto. A percentage height on the root element is relative to the initial containing block.
trans-unit.target: 相对于生成的框的包含块的高度计算百分比。如果未明确指定包含块的高度（即，它取决于内容的高度），并且此元素不是绝对定位的，则该值将计算为 auto 。根元素上的百分比高度是相对于初始包含块的高度。

trans-unit.source: The percentage offset of the given background image's position is relative to the container. A value of 0% means that the left (or top) edge of the background image is aligned with the corresponding left (or top) edge of the container, or the 0% mark of the image will be on the 0% mark of the container. A value of 100% means that the right (or bottom) edge of the background image is aligned with the right (or bottom) edge of the container, or the 100% mark of the image will be on the 100% mark of the container. Thus a value of 50% horizontally or vertically centers the background image as the 50% of the image will be at the 50% mark of the container. Similarly, background-position: 25% 75% means the spot on the image that is 25% from the left and 75% from the top will be placed at the spot of the container that is 25% from the container's left and 75% from the container's top.
trans-unit.target: 给定背景图像位置的百分比偏移量是相对于容器的。值为0％表示背景图像的左侧（或顶部）边缘与容器的相应左侧（或顶部）边缘对齐，否则图像的0％标记将位于容器的0％标记上容器。该为100％表示的值向右（或底部的背景图像）的边缘与所述对齐的右（或底部）的图像的100％的标记容器的边缘，或将所述容器的100％的标记上。因此，将背景图像在水平或垂直方向上居中放置50％的值，因为图像的50％将位于容器的50％标记处。同样， background-position: 25% 75% 表示图像上距左侧25％，距顶部75％的点将放置在距容器左侧25％，距容器顶部75％的容器点上。

trans-unit.source: The perspective distance used by perspective() is specified by a <length> value, which represents the distance between the user and the z=0 plane. A positive value makes the element appear closer to the user, a negative value farther.
trans-unit.target: perspective() 使用的透视距离由 <length> 值指定，该值表示用户与z = 0平面之间的距离。正值使元素看起来更接近用户，负值使元素看起来更接近用户。

trans-unit.source: The perspective distance used by perspective() is specified by a <length> value, which represents the distance between the user and the z=0 plane. The z=0 plane is the plane where everything appears in a 2-dimensional view, or the screen. A positive value makes the element appear closer to the user than the rest of the interface, a negative value farther. The greater the value, the further away the perspective of the user is.
trans-unit.target: perspective() 使用的透视距离由 <length> 值指定，该值表示用户与z = 0平面之间的距离。z = 0平面是二维视图或屏幕中所有内容均出现的平面。正值使元素看起来比界面的其余部分更靠近用户，负值则使元素看起来更接近用户。值越大，用户的视野越远。

trans-unit.source: The physical border to which border-inline-end maps depends on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top, border-right, border-bottom, or border-left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: border-inline-end 映射到的物理边界取决于元素的书写模式，方向性和文本方向。它对应于 border-top ， border-right ， border-bottom 或 border-left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical border to which border-inline-start maps depends on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top, border-right, border-bottom, or border-left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: border-inline-start 映射到的物理边界取决于元素的书写模式，方向性和文本方向。它对应于 border-top ， border-right ， border-bottom 或 border-left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical borders to which border-inline maps depends on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top and border-bottom or border-right, and border-left properties, depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: border-inline 映射到的物理边界取决于元素的书写模式，方向性和文本方向。它对应于 border-top 和 border-bottom 或 border-right 和 border-left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The physical values used with the float and clear properties are left, right and both. The Logical Properties specification defines the values inline-start and inline-end as mappings for left and right.

trans-unit.source: The property is referred to as the Explicit Grid Shorthand because it is setting those things that you control when you define an explicit grid, and not those which impact any implicit row or column tracks that might be created.

trans-unit.source: The property is useful since the legibility of fonts, especially at small sizes, is determined more by the size of lowercase letters than by the size of capital letters. Legibility can become an issue when the first-choice font-family is unavailable and its replacement has a significantly different aspect ratio (the ratio of the size of lowercase letters to the size of the font).
trans-unit.target: 该属性很有用，因为字体的可读性（尤其是小字体）更多地由小写字母的大小而不是大写字母的大小决定。当首选 font-family 不可用并且其替换具有明显不同的长宽比（小写字母大小与字体大小之比）时，易读性可能会成为一个问题。

trans-unit.source: The property sets the base text direction of block-level elements and the direction of embeddings created by the unicode-bidi property. It also sets the default alignment of text, block-level elements, and the direction that cells flow within a table row.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置块级元素的基本文本方向以及 unicode-bidi 属性创建的嵌入方向。它还设置文本，块级元素的默认对齐方式，以及表格行中单元格流动的方向。

trans-unit.target: 该属性最初是一个非标准且没有前缀的Microsoft扩展，称为 word-wrap ，并且由大多数具有相同名称的浏览器实现。此后已将其重命名为 overflow-wrap ，其中 word-wrap 是别名。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this descriptor is to allow the font resources to be segmented so that a browser only needs to download the font resource needed for the text content of a particular page. For example, a site with many localizations could provide separate font resources for English, Greek and Japanese. For users viewing the English version of a page, the font resources for Greek and Japanese fonts wouldn't need to be downloaded, saving bandwidth.
trans-unit.target: 这个描述符的目的是允许字体资源被分割,以便浏览器只需要下载特定页面的文本内容所需的字体资源。例如,一个有许多本地化的网站可以为英语、希腊语和日语提供单独的字体资源。对于浏览网页英文版本的用户来说,就不需要下载希腊文和日文字体的字体资源,从而节省带宽。

trans-unit.source: The relative change in hue of the input sample, specified as an <angle>. A value of 0deg leaves the input unchanged. There is no minimum or maximum value; hue-rotate(Ndeg) evaluates to N modulo 360.

trans-unit.source: The remaining space is the size of the flex container minus the size of all flex items' sizes together. trans-unit.target: 剩余空间是指弹性容器的尺寸减去所有弹性物品的尺寸之和。如果所有同级物品具有相同的弹性增长因子,那么所有物品将获得相同的剩余空间份额,否则将根据不同的弹性增长因子定义的比例进行分配。

trans-unit.source: The repeating-conic-gradient syntax is similar to the conic-gradient() and repeating-radial-gradient() syntax. Like the non-repeating conic-gradient, the color-stops are placed around a gradient arc. Like the repeating radial gradient, the size of the repeating section is the first color stop subtracted from the angle of the last color stop.
trans-unit.target: repeating-conic-gradient语法类似于 conic-gradient() 和 repeating-radial-gradient() 语法。像非重复圆锥形渐变一样，色标也放置在渐变弧周围。像重复的径向渐变一样，重复部分的大小是从最后一个色标的角度减去第一个色标。

trans-unit.source: The replaced content is scaled to maintain its aspect ratio while fitting within the element’s content box. The entire object is made to fill the box, while preserving its aspect ratio, so the object will be "letterboxed" if its aspect ratio does not match the aspect ratio of the box.
trans-unit.target: 缩放替换后的内容以保持其纵横比，同时将其放入元素的内容框中。使整个对象填充盒子，同时保留其长宽比，因此，如果对象的长宽比与盒子的长宽比不匹配，则将“信箱”化。
