trans-unit.source: The result is that if the control was valid when the user started interacting with it, the validity styling is changed only when the user shifts focus to another control. However, if the user is trying to correct a previously-flagged value, the control shows immediately when the value becomes valid. Required items are flagged as invalid only if the user changes them or attempts to submit an unchanged invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 结果是,如果当用户开始与控件交互时,该控件是有效的,那么只有当用户将焦点转移到另一个控件时,有效性样式才会被改变。然而,如果用户试图纠正一个先前标记的值,当该值变成有效时,控件会立即显示。只有当用户更改了所需项目或试图提交一个未更改的无效值时,所需项目才会被标记为无效。

trans-unit.source: The result is that if the control was valid when the user started interacting with it, the validity styling is changed only when the user shifts focus to another control. However, if the user is trying to correct a previously-flagged value, the control shows immediately when the value becomes valid. Required items have the pseudo-class applied only if the user changes them or attempts to submit an unchanged valid value.
trans-unit.target: 结果是,如果当用户开始与控件交互时,该控件是有效的,那么只有当用户将焦点转移到另一个控件时,有效性样式才会被改变。然而,如果用户正试图纠正一个先前标记的值,当该值成为有效值时,控件会立即显示。只有当用户更改它们或试图提交一个未更改的有效值时,必填项才会应用伪类。

trans-unit.source: The result of this is that your items will all line up in a row, using the size of the content as their size in the main axis. If there are more items than can fit in the container, they will not wrap but will instead overflow. If some items are taller than others, all items will stretch along the cross axis to fill its full size.

trans-unit.source: The second paragraph has a value of max-content and so it does the opposite. It gets as big as it possibly can be, taking no soft-wrapping opportunities. It would overflow the box it is in if that container was too narrow.

trans-unit.source: The second reason is that flexbox prevents small items from shrinking to zero size during this removal of negative free space. The items will be floored at their min-content size — the size that they become if they take advantage of any soft wrapping opportunities available to them.
trans-unit.target: 第二个原因是flexbox可以防止在删除负的自由空间期间将小物件缩小到零尺寸。这些物品将以 min-content 尺寸铺地板-如果它们利用了可用的任何软包装机会，它们就会变成最小尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The second rule sets links within an element with the class my-class-1 to inherit its color from its parent. In this case, it means that the link inherits its color from its <li> parent, which, by default inherits its color from its own <ul> parent, which ultimately inherits its color from the <body> element, which had its color set to green by the first rule.
trans-unit.target: 第二条规则将元素内具有类 my-class-1 的链接设置为从其父级继承其颜色。在这种情况下，它意味着链路从其继承其颜色 <li> 母体，其中，通过默认从它自己的继承其颜色 <ul> 母体，这最终继承其颜色从 <body> 元件，其具有它的 color 根据第一条规则设置为 green 。

trans-unit.source: The second-level menu is absolutely positioned inside the parent element. In order to put it above all first-level menus, a z-index is used. trans-unit.source: The shadow filter can be applied to the <img> object by setting the filter on the image's parent container.

trans-unit.source: The shadow's blur radius, specified as a <length>. The larger the value, the larger and more blurred the shadow becomes. If unspecified, it defaults to 0, resulting in a sharp, unblurred edge. Negative values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 阴影的模糊半径，指定为 <length> 。值越大，阴影变得越大且越模糊。如果未指定，则默认为 0 ，从而产生清晰的，不模糊的边缘。不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: The shadow's spread radius, specified as a <length>. Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, while negative values will cause the shadow to shrink. If unspecified, it defaults to 0, and the shadow will be the same size as the input image.

trans-unit.source: The size and position of an element are often impacted by its containing block. Most often, the containing block is the content area of an element's nearest block-level ancestor, but this is not always the case. In this article, we examine the factors that determine an element's containing block.
trans-unit.target: 元素的大小和位置通常受其包含的块影响。通常，包含块是元素最接近的块级祖先的内容区域，但并非总是如此。在本文中，我们将研究确定元素包含块的因素。

trans-unit.source: The size and position of an element are often impacted by its containing block. Percentage values that are applied to the width, height, padding, margin, and offset properties of an absolutely positioned element (i.e., which has its position set to absolute or fixed) are computed from the element's containing block.
trans-unit.target: 元素的大小和位置通常受其包含的块影响。从元素的包含块中计算应用于 absolute 定位的元素（即，其 position 设置为absolute或 fixed ）的 width ， height ， padding ， margin 和offset属性的百分比值。

trans-unit.source: The size of a 1em character
trans-unit.target: 1em 字符的大小

trans-unit.source: The size of the border-image outset as a dimension — a number with a unit.
trans-unit.target: border-image 的大小从一个维度开始，即一个带单位的数字。

trans-unit.source: The size of the border-image outset as a multiple of the element's corresponding border-widths. For example, if an element has border-width: 1em 2px 0 1.5rem, and border-image-outset: 2, the final border-image-outset would be calculated as 2em 4px 0 3rem.
trans-unit.target: border-image 的大小开始时是元素对应的 border-width s的倍数。例如，如果一个元素的 border-width: 1em 2px 0 1.5rem 和 border-image-outset: 2 ，则最终的 border-image-outset 将计算为 2em 4px 0 3rem 。

trans-unit.source: The size of the border outset as a dimension.
trans-unit.target: 边框起始的尺寸为一个维度。

trans-unit.source: The size of the border outset as a multiple of the corresponding border-width.
trans-unit.target: 边框的大小开始时是相应 border-width 的倍数。

trans-unit.source: The size of the color swatch can be set with the background-size property. This is different from the background-color, which sets a color to cover the entire element. Both image(color) and background-color placements are impacted by the background-clip and background-origin properties.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 background-size 属性设置颜色样本的大小。这不同于 background-color ，后者将颜色设置为覆盖整个元素。两个 image(color) 和 background-color 的展示位置是由影响 background-clip 和 background-origin 的性质。

trans-unit.source: The size of the element's background positioning area
trans-unit.target: 元素的背景定位区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the element's border image area
trans-unit.target: 元素的边框图像区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the emphasis symbol, like ruby symbols, is about 50% of the size of the font, and text-emphasis may affect line height when the current leading is not enough for the marks.
trans-unit.target: 强调符号的大小（如红宝石符号）约为字体大小的50％，当当前行距不足以显示标记时， text-emphasis 可能会影响行高。

trans-unit.source: The size of the gap between columns, defined as a <length>. The <length> property's value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 列之间的间隙大小，定义为 <length> 。所述 <length> 属性的值必须是非负的。

trans-unit.source: The size of the gap between columns, defined as a <percentage>. The <percentage> property's value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 列之间的间隙大小，定义为 <percentage> 。该 <percentage> 属性的值必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: The size of the gradient line or arc that repeats is the length between the first color stop value and the last color stop length value. If the first color stop just has a color and no color stop length, the value defaults to 0. If the last color stop has just a color and no color stop length, the value defaults to 100%. If neither is declared, the gradient line is 100% meaning the linear and conic gradients will not repeat and the radial gradient will only repeat if the radius of the gradient is smaller than the length between the center of the gradient and the farthest corner. If the first color stop is declared, and the value is greater than 0, the gradient will repeat, as the size of the line or arc is the difference between the first color stop and last color stop is less than 100% or 360 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 重复的渐变线或弧线的大小是第一个颜色停止值和最后一个颜色停止长度值之间的长度,如果第一个颜色停止只有颜色而没有颜色停止长度,该值默认为0。如果第一个颜色停止值只有一个颜色,没有颜色停止长度,那么该值默认为0;如果最后一个颜色停止值只有一个颜色,没有颜色停止长度,那么该值默认为100%。如果两者都没有声明,则渐变线为100%,这意味着线性和圆锥形渐变线不会重复,而径向渐变线只有在渐变线半径小于渐变线中心和最远角之间的长度时才会重复。如果声明了第一个色止点,且该值大于0,则渐变会重复,因为线或弧的大小是第一个色止点和最后一个色止点之间的差值小于100%或360度。

trans-unit.source: The size of the margin area is determined by the margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, margin-left, and shorthand margin properties. When margin collapsing occurs, the margin area is not clearly defined since margins are shared between boxes.
trans-unit.target: 边距区域的大小由 margin-top ， margin-right ， margin-bottom ， margin-left 和简写 margin 属性确定。当余量折叠发生时，空白区域没有被明确定义，因为边距框之间共享。

trans-unit.source: The size of the margin area is determined by the margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, margin-left, and shorthand margin properties. When margin collapsing occurs, the margin area is not clearly defined since margins are shared between boxes.
trans-unit.target: 边距区域的大小由 margin-top ， margin-right ， margin-bottom ， margin-left 和简写 margin 属性确定。当余量折叠发生时，空白区域没有被明确定义，因为边距框之间共享。

trans-unit.source: The size of the margin as a fixed value.
trans-unit.target: 保证金的大小为固定值。

trans-unit.source: The size of the margin as a percentage, relative to the width of the containing block.
trans-unit.target: 余量为百分比，相对于所述的尺寸宽度的的包含块。

trans-unit.source: The size of the margin as a percentage, relative to the width of the containing block.
trans-unit.target: 页边距的大小，以百分比为单位，相对于包含块的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The size of the mask border outset as a dimension.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩边框的尺寸,以尺寸为单位。

trans-unit.source: The size of the mask border outset as a multiple of the corresponding border-width.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩边框的大小开始时是相应 border-width 的倍数。

trans-unit.source: The size of the padding as a fixed value.
trans-unit.target: 填充的大小为固定值。

trans-unit.source: The size of the padding as a fixed value. Must be nonnegative.
trans-unit.target: padding的大小为固定值。必须为非负值。

trans-unit.source: The size of the padding as a percentage, relative to the width of the containing block.
trans-unit.target: 相对于包含块的宽度，以百分比为单位的填充大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the padding as a percentage, relative to the width of the containing block. Must be nonnegative.
trans-unit.target: 相对于包含块的宽度，以百分比为单位的填充大小。必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: The size of the padding as a percentage, relative to the width of the containing block. Must be nonnegative.
trans-unit.target: padding的大小,相对于包含块的宽度的百分比。必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: The size of the spacing as a fixed value.
trans-unit.target: 间距的大小为固定值。

trans-unit.source: The slicing process creates nine regions in total: four corners, four edges, and a middle region. Four slice lines, set a given distance from their respective sides, control the size of the regions.
trans-unit.target: 切片过程共创建九个区域:四个角、四个边和一个中间区域。四条切片线,从各自的边上设定一个给定的距离,控制区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The smallest allowed zoom factor. A zoom factor of 100% corresponds to no zooming. Larger values zoom in. Smaller values zoom out.
trans-unit.target: 允许的最小缩放系数。缩放系数为100%相当于不缩放。较大的数值会放大。较小的值会放大,较小的值会缩小。

trans-unit.source: The source image's edge regions are stretched to fill the gap between each border.
trans-unit.target: 源图像的边缘区域被拉伸以填充每个边界之间的间隙。

trans-unit.source: The source image's edge regions are tiled (repeated) to fill the gap between each border. Extra space will be distributed in between tiles to achieve the proper fit.
trans-unit.target: 源图像的边缘区域被平铺(重复)以填补每个边界之间的空隙。额外的空间将被分配在瓷砖之间,以达到适当的配合。

trans-unit.source: The source image's edge regions are tiled (repeated) to fill the gap between each border. Tiles may be clipped to achieve the proper fit.
trans-unit.target: 源图像的边缘区域被平铺(重复)以填补每个边界之间的空白。瓷砖可以被剪掉,以达到适当的配合。

trans-unit.source: The source image's edge regions are tiled (repeated) to fill the gap between each border. Tiles may be stretched to achieve the proper fit.
trans-unit.target: 对源图像的边缘区域进行平铺(重复),以填补每个边界之间的空白。瓷砖可以被拉伸以达到适当的配合。

trans-unit.source: The source image. See border-image-source.
trans-unit.target: 源图像。参见 border-image-source 。

trans-unit.source: The source image. See mask-border-source.
trans-unit.target: 源图像。参见 mask-border-source 。

trans-unit.source: The source is placed over the destination.
trans-unit.target: 源头放在目的地之上。

trans-unit.source: The source is placed, where it falls outside of the destination.
trans-unit.target: 源头放在哪里,哪里就属于目的地之外。

trans-unit.source: The spec explains that margins between block elements collapse. This means that if you have an element with a top margin immediately after an element with a bottom margin, rather than the total space being the sum of these two margins, the margin collapses, and so will essentially become as large as the larger of the two margins.
trans-unit.target: 该规范说明，块元素之间的边距会崩溃。这意味着，如果您在一个元素的底边距紧后有一个顶部边距的元素，而不是总空间是这两个边距的总和，则该边距会塌陷，因此实际上会变得与两个边距。

trans-unit.source: The specific case of inherit, initial and unset
trans-unit.target: inherit ， initial 和未 unset 的具体情况

trans-unit.source: The specification also details some suppression triggers, which will disable scroll anchoring in places where it might be problematic. If any of the triggers happen on the anchor node, or an ancestor of it, anchoring is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 该规范还详细介绍了一些抑制触发器，这些触发器将在可能存在问题的位置禁用滚动锚定。如果任何触发发生在锚点节点或其祖先上，则锚点被抑制。

trans-unit.source: The specification defines :is() and :where() as accepting a forgiving selector list.
trans-unit.target: 规范将 :is() 和 :where() 定义为接受宽容的选择器列表。

trans-unit.source: The specification defines column-rule-width, column-rule-style and column-rule-color, providing a shorthand column-rule. These properties work in exactly the same way as the border properties: any valid border-style can be used as a column-rule-style.
trans-unit.target: 该规范定义了 column-rule-width ， column-rule-style 和 column-rule-color ，提供了简写的 column-rule 。这些属性的工作方式与 border 属性完全相同：任何有效的 border-style 都可以用作 column-rule-style 。

trans-unit.source: The specification defines the inline base direction as the direction in which content is ordered on a line. This defines the start and end of the inline direction. The start is where sentences start and the end is where a line of text ends before it would begin to wrap onto a new line.
trans-unit.target: 规范将内联基本方向定义为在一行上订购内容的方向。这定义了内联方向的起点和终点。起点是句子的起点，终点是一行文本的结尾，然后才开始换行。

trans-unit.source: The specification defines three new properties:
trans-unit.target: 该规范定义了三个新属性。

trans-unit.source: The specification details mappings for each logical value to a physical counterpart. In the table below I have given these mapped values assuming that the writing-mode in use is horizontal-tb — with a left to right direction. The inline direction therefore runs horizontally — left to right — and margin-inline-start would be equivalent to margin-left.
trans-unit.target: 该规范详细说明了每个逻辑值到物理对应项的映射。在下表中，我给出了这些映射值，并假设使用的 writing-mode 为 horizontal-tb ，并且方向为从左到右。因此，内联方向是水平方向（从左到右），并且 margin-inline-start 将等同于 margin-left 。

trans-unit.source: The specification details some alignment terminology to make it easier to discuss these alignment properties outside of their implementation within a particular layout method. There are also some key concepts which are common to all layout methods.
trans-unit.target: 该规范详细说明了一些对齐术语,以便在特定布局方法内实现这些对齐属性之外,更容易讨论它们。此外,还有一些对所有布局方法都通用的关键概念。

trans-unit.source: The specification details that the default behavior in align-self is to stretch, except for items which have an intrinsic aspect ratio, in this case they behave as start. The reason for this, is that if items with an aspect ratio are set to stretch, this default would distort them.
trans-unit.target: 规范详细说明了 align-self 的默认行为是拉伸，除了具有固有长宽比的项目外，在这种情况下，它们的行为是 start 。这样做的原因是，如果将具有高宽比的项目设置为拉伸，则此默认值会使它们变形。

trans-unit.source: The specification doesn't define how borders of different styles connect in the corners.
trans-unit.target: 规范没有定义不同风格的边框如何在角上连接。

trans-unit.source: The specification for the cross-fade() function allows for multiple images and for each image to have transparency values independent of the other values. This was not always the case. The original syntax, which has been implemented in some browsers, only allowed for two images, with the sum of the transparency of those two images being exactly 100%. The original syntax is supported in Safari and supported with the -webkit- prefix in Chrome, Opera, and other blink-based browsers.
trans-unit.target: cross-fade() 函数的规范允许多个图像，并且每个图像都具有独立于其他值的透明度值。并非总是如此。在某些浏览器中实现的原始语法仅允许使用两个图像，并且这两个图像的透明度之和正好是100％。Safari支持原始语法，Chrome，Opera和其他基于眨眼的浏览器均支持 -webkit- 前缀。

trans-unit.source: The specification has fairly recently added flow-relative values for the border-radius longhands. These have not yet been implemented by any browser. The below example, in a horizontal writing-mode, would set the top-right border radius to 1em, the bottom-right to 0, the bottom-left to 20px and the top-left to 40px.
trans-unit.target: 该规范最近为 border-radius 长手添加了相对流量值。这些尚未由任何浏览器实现。下面的示例在水平 writing-mode ，将右上边框半径设置为1em，右下边框设置为0，左下边框设置为20px，左上边框设置为40px。

trans-unit.source: The specification makes a suggestion for the four-value shorthands such as the margin property, however the final decision on how this should be indicated is as yet unresolved, and is discussed in this issue.
trans-unit.target: 该规范对诸如 margin 属性之类的四值速记提出了建议，但是关于如何指示该值的最终决定尚未解决，并将在本期中进行讨论。

trans-unit.source: The specification provides a new property, overflow-anchor, which can be used to disable scroll anchoring on all or part of the document. It's essentially a way to opt out of the new behavior.
trans-unit.target: 该规范提供了一个新属性 overflow-anchor ，可用于禁用全部或部分文档上的滚动锚定。从本质上讲，这是选择退出新行为的一种方式。

trans-unit.source: The specification says that in this scenario, if box 1 really makes sense logically in that position, we should go back to our source and make the change there rather than reordering using grid layout. This is what is meant by visual versus logical reordering, logical ordering is important for the meaning and structure of our document, and we should make sure that we preserve that structure.
trans-unit.target: 规范说,在这种情况下,如果框1在那个位置上真的有逻辑意义,我们应该回到源头,在那里进行修改,而不是使用网格布局重新排序。这就是视觉与逻辑重新排序的意思,逻辑排序对于我们文档的意义和结构是很重要的,我们应该确保保留这种结构。

trans-unit.source: The specification states that additional CSS properties may be supported in future.
trans-unit.target: 该规范指出,未来可能会支持更多的CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The specification warns authors (the CSSWG term for web developers) not to do this reordering.
trans-unit.target: 该规范警告作者(CSSWG对Web开发者的称呼)不要进行这种重新排序。

trans-unit.source: The specificity-adjustment pseudo-class :where() always has its specificity replaced with zero.
trans-unit.target: 特异性调整伪类 :where() 始终将其特异性替换为零。

trans-unit.source: The specified <length> is used in the calculation of the line box height step.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <length> 用于线框高度步长的计算。

trans-unit.source: The specified <length> is used in the calculation of the line box height. Values given in em units may produce unexpected results (see example below).
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <length> 用于线框高度的计算。以em为单位给出的值可能会产生意外结果（请参见下面的示例）。

trans-unit.source: The specified behavior of the -ms-scroll-limit-x-max property is only applicable at a mscontentzoomfactor of 1; the behavior of this property is undefined at other zoom factors.
trans-unit.target: -ms-scroll-limit-x-max 属性的指定行为仅适用于 mscontentzoomfactor 为1的情况；在其他缩放系数下，此属性的行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: The specified behavior of the -ms-scroll-limit-x-min property is only applicable at a mscontentzoomfactor of 1; the behavior of this property is undefined at other zoom factors.
trans-unit.target: -ms-scroll-limit-x-min 属性的指定行为仅适用于 mscontentzoomfactor 为1的情况；在其他缩放系数下，此属性的行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: The specified behavior of the -ms-scroll-limit-y-max property is only applicable at a mscontentzoomfactor of 1; the behavior of this property is undefined at other zoom factors.
trans-unit.target: -ms-scroll-limit-y-max 属性的指定行为仅适用于 mscontentzoomfactor 为1的情况；在其他缩放系数下，此属性的行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: The specified behavior of the -ms-scroll-limit-y-min property is only applicable at a mscontentzoomfactor of 1; the behavior of this property is undefined at other zoom factors.
trans-unit.target: -ms-scroll-limit-y-min 属性的指定行为仅在 mscontentzoomfactor 为1时适用；在其他缩放系数下，此属性的行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: The specified behavior of the -ms-scroll-limit property is only applicable at a mscontentzoomfactor of 1; the behavior of this property is undefined at other zoom factors.
trans-unit.target: -ms-scroll-limit 属性的指定行为仅在 mscontentzoomfactor 为1时适用；在其他缩放系数下，此属性的行为未定义。

trans-unit.source: The specified string will be used as the item's marker.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字符串将被用作项目的标记。

trans-unit.source: The specified value will impact the appearance of the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 指定的值将影响以下属性的外观。

trans-unit.source: The stack level of the box in the current stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 当前堆栈上下文中框的堆栈级别。

trans-unit.source: The stack won't consider this child when calculating its size.
trans-unit.target: 堆栈在计算其大小时不会考虑这个子代。

trans-unit.source: The stacking context
trans-unit.target: 叠加背景

trans-unit.source: The standard-compatible way to center a block itself without centering its inline content is setting the left and right margin to auto, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 在不居中放置块内容的情况下，将块本身居中 margin 的标准兼容方法是将左右边距设置为 auto ，例如：

trans-unit.source: The start alignment of this box's scroll snap area, within the scroll container's snapport is a snap position in this axis.
trans-unit.target: 本框的滚动卡位区域的起始对齐方式,在滚动容器的卡位内就是本轴的一个卡位。

trans-unit.source: The start and end of the text decoration is inset slightly (e.g., by half of the line thickness) from the content edge of the decorating box. Thus, adjacent elements receive separate underlines. (This is important in Chinese, where underlining is a form of punctuation.)
trans-unit.target: 文本装饰的开始和结束从装饰框的内容边缘略微插入(例如,线粗的一半)。这样,相邻的元素就会得到单独的下划线。这在中文中很重要,因为在中文中,下划线是标点符号的一种形式)。

trans-unit.source: The start line will also change if you change the flex-direction property — for example using row-reverse instead of row.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改 flex-direction 属性，则起始行也将更改，例如，使用 row-reverse 而不是 row 。

trans-unit.source: The steps() class of timing functions
trans-unit.target: 计时函数的步骤()类

trans-unit.target: grid-area 属性中值的奇怪顺序

trans-unit.source: The string is split into three boxes in the box tree. The part of the string before the paragraph element is wrapped in an anonymous box, then we have the <p>, which generates a box, and then another anonymous box.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串在框树中分为三个框。段落元素之前的字符串部分被包装在一个匿名框中，然后有 <p> ，它生成一个框，然后是另一个匿名框。

trans-unit.source: The stroke bounding box is used as the reference box.
trans-unit.target: 描边框作为参考框。

trans-unit.target: animation 属性的子属性为：

trans-unit.target: 支持的浏览器

trans-unit.source: The syntax for loading variable fonts is very similar to any other web font, with a few notable differences, which are provided via upgrades to the traditional @font-face syntax now available in modern browsers.
trans-unit.target: 加载可变字体的语法与任何其他网络字体非常相似，但有一些显着差异，这些差异是通过升级到现代浏览器中现在可用的传统 @font-face 语法提供的。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the rectangle is similar to the rect() function generating a <<shape>()> CSS type. All four values are relative to the upper left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的语法类似于产生 <<shape>()> CSS类型的 rect() 函数。所有四个值均相对于图像的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The syntax from a previous version of the specification, where the isolate keyword could be used together with bidi-override, is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用规范先前版本中的语法，其中 isolate 关键字可以与 bidi-override 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is similar to the clip property. All four values are relative to the upper left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: 语法类似于 clip 属性。所有四个值均相对于图像的左上角。

trans-unit.target: <custom-ident> 的语法与CSS标识符（例如属性名称）相似，区别在于它们区分大小写。它由一个或多个字符组成，其中字符可以是以下任意一个：

trans-unit.source: The syntax of <custom-ident> is similar to CSS identifiers (such as property names), except that it is case-sensitive. It consists of one or more characters, where characters can be any of the following:
The syntax of <dimension> is a <number> immediately followed by a unit which is an identifier. Unit identifiers are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: <dimension> 的语法是 <number> ，其后紧跟一个作为标识符的单位。单位标识符不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of <number> extends the syntax of <integer>. A fractional value is represented by a . followed by one or more decimal digits, and may be appended to an integer. There is no unit associated with numbers.
trans-unit.target: 的语法 <number> 延伸的语法 <integer> 。分数值由表示 . 后跟一个或多个十进制数字，并且可以附加到整数之后。没有与数字关联的单位。

trans-unit.target: 各层的语法如下。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the fallback, like that of custom properties, allows commas. But, if the property value doesn't support commas, the value is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 回退的语法,和自定义属性的语法一样,允许使用逗号。但是,如果属性值不支持逗号,则该值无效。

trans-unit.source: The text that provides the interactive control's accessible name can be hidden using a combination of properties that remove it visually from the screen but keep it parseable by assistive technology. This is commonly used for buttons that rely solely on an icon to convey purpose.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用属性的组合来隐藏提供交互式控件的可访问名称的文本，这些属性可以从屏幕上直观地将其删除，但可以通过辅助技术对其进行解析。通常用于仅依靠图标传达目的的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the borders are determined by the border-width and shorthand border properties. If the box-sizing property is set to border-box, the border area's size can be explicitly defined with the width, min-width, max-width, height, min-height, and max-height properties. When there is a background (background-color or background-image) set on a box, it extends to the outer edge of the border (i.e. extends underneath the border in z-ordering). This default behavior can be altered with the background-clip css property.
trans-unit.target: 边框的粗细由 border-width 和速记 border 属性决定。如果 box-sizing 属性设置为 border-box ，则可以使用 width ， min-width ， max-width ， height ， min-height 和 max-height 属性显式定义边界区域的大小。当在盒子上设置背景（ background-color 或 background-image ）时，它会延伸到边框的外边缘（即以z顺序在边框下方延伸）。可以使用 background-clip 更改此默认行为 CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the borders are determined by the border-width and shorthand border properties. If the box-sizing property is set to border-box, the border area's size can be explicitly defined with the width, min-width, max-width, height, min-height, and max-height properties. When there is a background (background-color or background-image) set on a box, it extends to the outer edge of the border (i.e. extends underneath the border in z-ordering). This default behavior can be altered with the background-clip css property.
trans-unit.target: 边框的粗细由 border-width 和速记 border 属性决定。如果 box-sizing 属性设置为 border-box ，则可以使用 width ， min-width ， max-width ， height ， min-height 和 max-height 属性显式定义边界区域的大小。当在盒子上设置背景（ background-color 或 background-image ）时，它会延伸到边框的外边缘（即以z顺序在边框下方延伸）。可以使用 background-clip 更改此默认行为 CSS属性。

trans-unit.target: 第三个值必须是 <length> 。它始终代表Z偏移。

trans-unit.target: 速记属性的三个值可以按任意顺序指定,也可以省略其中的一个或两个。

trans-unit.source: The three-column layout has two 1fr unit side columns and a middle column that has 4fr as the track size. This means that the available space in the container is split into 6 and assigned in proportion to our three tracks – one part each to the side columns and 4 parts to the center.
trans-unit.target: 三列布局具有两个 1fr 单位的侧栏和一个中间栏，其轨道尺寸为 4fr 。这意味着容器中的可用空间被分成6个，并按我们的三个轨道成比例分配-一部分分配给侧柱，另外4个分配给中心。

trans-unit.source: The time offset, from the moment at which the animation is applied to the element, at which the animation should begin. This may be specified in either seconds (s) or milliseconds (ms). The unit is required.
trans-unit.target: 从将动画应用到元素开始的时间开始的时间偏移。可以以秒（ s ）或毫秒（ ms ）来指定。该单元是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The time that an animation takes to complete one cycle. This may be specified in either seconds (s) or milliseconds (ms). The value must be positive or zero and the unit is required. A value of 0s, which is the default value, indicates that no animation should occur.
trans-unit.target: 动画完成一个周期所花费的时间。可以以秒（ s ）或毫秒（ ms ）来指定。该值必须为正或零，并且必须为单位。的值 0s ，这是缺省值，表示没有动画应该发生。

trans-unit.target: 对应于给定动画的计时函数，由 animation-name 确定。

trans-unit.source: The top and bottom margins have no effect on non-replaced inline elements, such as <span> or <code>.
trans-unit.target: 上边距和下边距对未替换的内联元素（例如 <span> 或 <code> )没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The track is the element of a scroll bar on which the scroll box can slide either up and down or left and right. The scroll box is the rectangular box within a scroll bar that can be moved either up and down or left and right on a track to change the position of the content on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 轨道是滚动条的元素,滚动框可以在轨道上上下或左右滑动。滚动框是滚动条中的矩形框,可以在轨道上上下或左右移动,以改变屏幕上内容的位置。

trans-unit.source: The transformation origin is the point around which a transformation is applied. For example, the transformation origin of the rotate() function is the center of rotation.

trans-unit.source: The transformation origin is the point around which a transformation is applied. For example, the transformation origin of the rotate() function is the center of rotation. (This property is applied by first translating the element by the negated value of the property, then applying the element's transform, then translating by the property value.)
trans-unit.target: 转换原点是围绕其应用转换的点。例如， rotate() 函数的变换原点是旋转中心。（通过首先使用属性的取反值转换元素，然后应用元素的变换，然后通过属性值进行转换，来应用此属性。）

trans-unit.target: 这两个属性也可以表示为速记 gap 。如果您仅给 gap 一个值，它将同时应用于列和行间隙。如果指定两个值，则第一个用于 row-gap ，第二个用于 column-gap 。

trans-unit.source: The two properties can also be expressed as a shorthand, grid-gap. If you only give one value for grid-gap it will apply to both column and row gaps. If you specify two values, the first is used for grid-row-gap and the second for grid-column-gap.
trans-unit.target: 这两个属性也可以表示为捷径 grid-gap 。如果您只为 grid-gap 提供一个值，则它将同时应用于列间隙和行间隙。如果指定两个值，则第一个用于 grid-row-gap ，第二个用于 grid-column-gap 。

trans-unit.source: The two shorthands for the grid container are the Explicit Grid Shorthand grid-template and the Grid Definition Shorthand grid.
trans-unit.target: 网格容器的两个简写是Explicit Grid简写 grid-template 和Grid Definition简写 grid 。

trans-unit.target: 双值语法

trans-unit.source: The two-value syntax for display: flow-root being display: block flow-root therefore makes a lot of sense. You are creating a block formatting context, with a block-level box and children participating in normal flow. What about the matched pair display: inline flow-root? This is the new way of describing display: inline-block.
trans-unit.target: 显示的两个值语法 display: flow-root 被 display: block flow-root 因此很有意义。您正在创建一个块格式化上下文，其中包含一个块级框，并且子级参与正常流程。配对 display: inline flow-root 怎么办？这是描述 display: inline-block 的新方法：inline-block。

trans-unit.source: The type of box: inline, inline-level, atomic inline-level, block.
trans-unit.target: 框的类型:内嵌、内嵌级、原子内嵌级、块。

trans-unit.target: 背景的统一颜色。尽管颜色仍可以通过图像中的任何透明度看到，但它会在指定的任何 background-image 后面呈现。

trans-unit.target: 通用速记属性

trans-unit.source: The updated properties have not yet been implemented in all browsers. Therefore, to use the gap properties in grid layout, you should use the grid-row-gap, grid-column-gap and grid-gap versions to ensure full compatibility. You could double up the properties and use both as you would for vendor prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 尚未在所有浏览器中实现更新的属性。因此，要在网格布局中使用间隙属性，应使用 grid-row-gap ， grid-column-gap 和 grid-gap 版本以确保完全兼容。您可以将属性加倍，并像使用供应商前缀一样使用它们。

trans-unit.target: 指向关于不存在的，具有一般错误条件的文档的URL about:invalid 。

trans-unit.target: 不建议使用此属性。应该改用适当的 alt 属性。

trans-unit.source: The used value is this unitless <number> multiplied by the element's own font size. The computed value is the same as the specified <number>. In most cases, this is the preferred way to set line-height and avoid unexpected results due to inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 使用的值是此无单位的 <number> 乘以元素自己的字体大小。计算值与指定的 <number> 相同。在大多数情况下，这是设置 line-height 并避免由于继承而导致意外结果的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: The used value of auto is determined as follows:
trans-unit.target: auto 的使用值确定如下：

trans-unit.source: The user (or reader) of the web site can choose to override styles in many browsers using a custom user stylesheet designed to tailor the experience to the user's wishes.
trans-unit.target: 网站的用户（或读者）可以选择使用自定义的用户样式表覆盖许多浏览器中的样式，该样式表旨在使体验适应用户的意愿。

trans-unit.source: The user agent decides the size of the page. In most cases, the dimensions and orientation of the target sheet are used.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理决定页面的大小。在大多数情况下,会使用目标页的尺寸和方向。

trans-unit.source: The user agent is allowed to make adjustments to the element as it deems appropriate and prudent in order to optimize the output for the device it's being rendered for. For example, when printing, a browser might opt to leave out all background images and to adjust text colors to be sure the contrast is optimized for reading on white paper. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理可以对元素进行它认为适当和谨慎的调整,以优化其在设备上的输出。例如,在打印时,浏览器可能会选择不显示所有的背景图片,并调整文本颜色,以确保对比度在白纸上阅读时得到优化。这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: The user agent selects an appropriate color for the caret. This is generally currentcolor, but the user agent may choose a different color to ensure good visibility and contrast with the surrounding content, taking into account the value of currentcolor, the background, shadows, and other factors.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理为插入符号选择适当的颜色。通常这是 currentcolor ，但是用户代理可以选择其他颜色以确保良好的可见性和与周围内容的对比度，同时考虑 currentcolor 的值，背景，阴影和其他因素。

trans-unit.source: The user agent selects the appropriate special styling based on the element. Acts as none on elements with no special styling.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理根据元素选择适当的特殊样式。作为 none 上没有特殊的造型元素。

trans-unit.source: The user agent will generate a counter representation as normal and would read it out letter by letter. If the user agent doesn't know how to read out a partiular counter symbol, the user agent might read it out as if the value of speak-as was numbers.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理将正常生成一个计数器表示，并将逐个字母读出。如果用户代理不知道如何读出partiular计数器符号，用户代理可以读出来，好像价值 speak-as 是 numbers 。

trans-unit.source: The user agent will generate a counter value as normal and read it out as a word in the document language.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理会像正常情况下一样生成一个计数器的值,并将其作为文档语言中的一个词读出来。

trans-unit.source: The user agent will set the document's orientation automatically, typically based on the device's orientation as determined by an accelerometer (if the device has such a hardware sensor), although there is often a user-controlled, OS-level "Lock orientation" setting that will trump the accelerometer reading.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理将自动设置文档的方向,通常基于加速计确定的设备方向(如果设备有这样的硬件传感器),尽管通常有一个由用户控制的操作系统级别的 "锁定方向 "设置,将胜过加速计读数。

trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过选中/选择一个元素来进入这个状态,或者通过取消选中/取消选择元素来脱离这个状态。

trans-unit.source: The value display: inline-block has been around since the early days of CSS. The reason we tend to use it is to allow padding to push inline items away from an element, when creating navigation items for example, or when wanting to add a background with padding to an inline element as in the example below.
trans-unit.target: 自CSS诞生以来，值 display: inline-block 一直存在。我们倾向于使用它的原因是允许填充（例如，在创建导航项时）或想要向内嵌元素添加带填充背景的元素时，将内嵌项从元素中推开，如下例所示。

trans-unit.source: The value horizontal-tb is the default for text on the web. It is the direction in which you are reading this guide. The other properties will change the way that text flows in our document, matching the different writing modes found around the world. Again, for full details of these see Jen’s article. As a simple example, I have two paragraphs below. The first uses the default horizontal-tb, and the second uses vertical-rl. In the mode text still runs left to right, however the direction of the text is vertical - inline text now runs down the page, from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 值 horizontal-tb 是网络上文本的默认值。这是您阅读本指南的方向。其他属性将更改文本在文档中的流动方式，以匹配世界各地发现的不同书写方式。同样，有关这些内容的详细信息，请参见Jen的文章。作为一个简单的示例，我在下面有两个段落。第一个使用默认的 horizontal-tb ，第二个使用 vertical-rl 。在此模式下，文本仍然从左到右运行，但是文本的方向是垂直的-内联文本现在从上到下沿着页面向下移动。

trans-unit.source: The value vertical-rl gives you a right-to-left block flow direction with a vertical inline direction, as shown in the next example.
trans-unit.target: 值 vertical-rl 为您提供从右到左的块流动方向以及垂直的内联方向，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The value can now be negative, in which case it computes to false.
trans-unit.target: 现在该值可以是负值,在这种情况下,它的计算结果为false。

trans-unit.source: The value given by the charset attribute of the Content-Type: HTTP header or the equivalent in the protocol used to serve the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 由 Content-Type: HTTP标头的 charset 属性给出的值或用于提供样式表的协议中的等效值。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <length> or <percentage> representing the ordinate of the translating vector. A percentage value refers to the height of the reference box defined by the transform-box property.
trans-unit.target: 该值是表示翻译矢量纵坐标的 <length> 或 <percentage> 。百分比值是指由 transform-box 属性定义的参考框的高度。

trans-unit.source: The value is a positive integer. The two keywords on and off are synonyms for 1 and 0 respectively. If no value is set, the default is 1. For non-Boolean OpenType features (e.g. stylistic alternates), the value implies a particular glyph to be selected; for Boolean values, it is a switch.
trans-unit.target: 整数形式。两个关键字 on 和 off 分别是 1 和 0 的同义词。如果未设置任何值，则默认值为 1 。对于非布尔型OpenType特征（例如，样式替代项），该值表示要选择的特定字形。对于布尔值，它是一个开关。

trans-unit.source: The value is a positive integer. The two keywords on and off are synonyms for 1 and 0 respectively. If no value is set, the default is 1. For non-Boolean OpenType features (e.g. stylistic alternates), the value implies a particular glyph to be selected; for Boolean values, it is a switch.
The value must be a <length>, a <percentage>, or one of the keywords left, center, right, top, and bottom.
trans-unit.target: 该值必须是 <length> ， <percentage> 或 left ， center ， right ， top 和 bottom 之一。

trans-unit.source: The value name of flow-root makes sense when you understand you are creating something that acts like the root element (html) in terms of how it creates a new context for the flow layout inside it.
trans-unit.target: 当您了解要创建类似于 root 元素（ html ）的行为时，就可以知道 flow-root 的值名称，就如何为其内部流布局创建新的上下文而言。

trans-unit.source: The value of grid-template-areas must show a complete grid, otherwise it is invalid (and the property is ignored). This means that you must have the same number of cells for each row, if empty with a full stop character demonstrating that the cell is to be left empty. You will also create an invalid grid if your areas are not rectangular.
trans-unit.target: grid-template-areas 的值必须显示完整的网格，否则它是无效的（并且该属性将被忽略）。这意味着每行必须具有相同数量的单元格，如果为空则带有句点字符，表明该单元格将保留为空。如果您的区域不是矩形，则还将创建一个无效的网格。

The value of the element's attribute x as a string. If there is no attribute x, an empty string is returned. The case-sensitivity of attribute names depends on the document language.
trans-unit.target: 元素的属性 x 的值作为字符串。如果没有属性 x ，则返回一个空字符串。属性名称的区分大小写取决于文档语言。

trans-unit.source: The value of the range descriptor can be either auto or a comma separated list of lower and upper bounds specified as integers.
trans-unit.target: 范围描述符的值可以是自动的,也可以是用逗号分隔的整数下限和上限列表。

trans-unit.source: The value of this descriptor is a prioritized, comma-separated list of external references or locally-installed font face names. When a font is needed the user agent iterates over the set of references listed using the first one it can successfully activate. Fonts containing invalid data or local font faces that are not found are ignored and the user agent loads the next font in the list.
trans-unit.target: 此描述符的值是按优先级，逗号分隔的外部参考列表或本地安装的字体名称。当需要一种字体时，用户代理可以使用第一个字体遍历列出的一组引用，它可以成功激活。包含无效数据或找不到的本地字体的字体将被忽略，并且用户代理将加载列表中的下一个字体。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is overridden by any declaration of the background or background-position shorthand properties applied to the element after it.
trans-unit.target: 该属性的值会被应用于该元素之后的 background 或 background-position 速记属性的任何声明所覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The value part of the property value pair matters more if you are testing for new values of a particular property. A good example would be the display property. All browsers support display, as display: block dates back to CSS1. However the values display: flex and display: grid are newer. There are often additional values added to properties in CSS, and so the fact that you have to test for property and value means that you can detect support for these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果要测试特定属性的新值，则属性值对的值部分更为重要。一个很好的例子是 display 属性。所有浏览器都支持 display ，如 display: block 可以追溯到CSS1。但是，值 display: flex 和 display: grid 较新。CSS中的属性通常添加了其他值，因此必须测试属性和值这一事实意味着您可以检测到对这些值的支持。

trans-unit.source: The value to add to the counter. Defaults to 1 if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到计数器的值。如果未指定，则默认为 1 。

trans-unit.source: The value to be used if the associated attribute is missing or contains an invalid value. If not set, CSS will use the default value defined for each <type-or-unit>.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的属性缺失或包含无效值，则使用该值。如果未设置，CSS将使用为每个 <type-or-unit> 定义的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The value to be used if the associated attribute is missing or contains an invalid value. The fallback value must be valid where attr() is used, even if it is not used, and must not contain another attr() expression. If attr() is not the sole component value of a property, its <fallback> value must be of the type defined by <type-or-unit>. If not set, CSS will use the default value defined for each <type-or-unit>.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的属性缺失或包含无效值，则使用该值。即使在未使用 attr() 的情况下，回退值也必须有效，并且必须不包含另一个 attr() 表达式。如果 attr() 不是属性的唯一组成部分值，则其 <fallback> 值必须为 <type-or-unit> 定义的类型。如果未设置，CSS将使用为每个 <type-or-unit> 定义的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The value to reset the counter to on each occurrence of the element. Defaults to 0 if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 每次出现元素时将计数器重置为的值。如果未指定，则默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: The value to set the counter to on each occurrence of the element. Defaults to 0 if not specified. If there isn't currently a counter of the given name on the element, the element will create a new counter of the given name with a starting value of 0 (though it may then immediately set or increment that value to something different).
trans-unit.target: 每次出现元素时将计数器设置为的值。如果未指定，则默认为 0 。如果元素上当前没有给定名称的计数器，则该元素将创建一个起始值为0的给定名称的新计数器（尽管随后它可能会立即将该值设置或递增为其他值）。

trans-unit.source: The value used is the value of the justify-items property of the parents box, unless the box has no parent, or is absolutely positioned, in these cases, auto represents normal.
trans-unit.target: 使用的值是父级框的 justify-items 属性的值，除非该框没有父级或处于绝对位置，在这种情况下， auto 表示 normal 。
